loans.name: Leonilda

texts.es:
Leonilda de 41 años, está casado con Juan de 50 años fruto de este amor tienen 06 hijos, ellos viven en su cas propia ubicado en el distrito de Llochegua. Leonilda, es una persona muy responsable, puntual y  valora mucho al cliente. A pesar de que Leonilda sufrió bastante, supo dejar de lado todos esos problemas y emprendió muchos negocios desde vender comida en una carretilla, vendiendo ropa de manera ambulante y ahora tiene una tienda de abarrotes gracias al capital que le facilito MFP, con el que poco a poco viene mejorando su condición economía.
Leonilda está agradecida a dicha institución que nuevamente accedió al crédito con el que incrementara  su tienda con nuevos productos. Usualmente trabaja con el apoyo de sus hijos mientras que el esposo trabaja con una camioneta prestando servicio de transporte de carga. Mas adelante desea verse con una tienda mas grande y lo mas importante ver a su familia feliz sin nada que les falte. Este es su segundo crédito con MFP, por lo que ella se compromete por segunda vez en cancelar puntualmente el pago de sus cuotas. Con los 2,500 nuevos soles lo invertirá en el incremento de mercadería.
texts.en:
Leonilda is 41 and married to Juan who is 50. As a sign of their love, they have 6 children together and live in their own home in the Llochegua district.  Leonilda is a very responsible and punctual person who highly values the customer.  Although Leonilda suffered plenty, she has set aside her problems and has started many businesses such as food truck meal sales,  a clothing street vendor and now a grocery store, all thanks to the loans facilitated by MFP with which, bit by bit, she improves her economic situation.

Leonilda is grateful to this institution that has agreed to another loan for her store in order to increase its available merchandise. She usually works with the support of her children while her husband works as a freight van driver. In the future, they envision a larger store and most importantly a happy family without anyone in need.  This is her second loan with MFP, to which she is committed to prompt punctual payments.  With the loan of  PEN 2,500 nuevo soles she will expand the grocery merchandise.

loans.use: to buy more products and merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Yom

texts.en:
Yom lives in Bor. She sells charcoal and has been in this business for three years. She is 30 year old, married, and has four children -- three of them are still in school. 

Yom heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer This is her fifth loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 2500 SDG in order to purchase more charcoal. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay school fees.

loans.use: buy charcoal

loans.name: Janet

texts.es: Janet, de 42 años de edad, es una mujer decidida y trabajadora, le gusta los retos y su mayor deseo es progresar y ser feliz. Es separada del padre de sus hijos. Vive en su propia casa en compañía de sus 2 hijos de 23 y 20 años de edad, de su nuera y su nieta. La actividad que realiza Janet es la venta de agua para uso domestico, para eso cuenta con un pozo tubular de donde extrae el liquido. Luego viendo la necesidad de sus vecinos de contar con agua, ya que no tenían éste elemental servicio, se decidió proporcionarles, en un principio vendiéndoles en cubetas, luego se decidieron en instalar pequeñas redes con tuberías para mayor comodidad. Tiene más de 10 años brindando éste servicio a sus vecinos, contando con el apoyo de sus hijos en el mantenimiento de las redes. Le gusta su negocio por los ingresos económicos, y el ayudar a cubrir la necesidad de sus vecinos de contar con agua en sus casas. Considera a su negocio rentable pues es un ingreso fijo y constante de manera mensual. Viendo las ganancias que le deja, tiene planes de continuar e incursionar en otro negocio, como en la venta de repuestos de motos, viendo que es rentable y así generarse más ingresos económicos. Este será el préstamo número 13 con la institución MFP, Está muy contenta de  saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá segura de avanzar con su negocio. Además comenta sentirse a gusto con su banco comunal, pues conoce a  sus miembros y los considera ser personas responsables y amables. Con el monto solicitado de 3000 nuevos soles los invertirá en el mantenimiento y reemplazo de las redes de tuberías, así como el pago del servicio de luz y reparación de la bomba de agua, para brindar un buen servicio.
texts.en:
Janet is a hard-working, dedicated 42 year old woman.  She enjoys challenges and her greatest desire is to succeed and be happy.  She is separated from her children’s father and lives in her own home with her two children (ages 20 and 23), her daughter-in-law, and her granddaughter.  

Janet sells water for household use and has a tube well from which she extracts the water. After seeing that her neighbors needed water because they didn’t have this basic service, she decided to provide it.  Initially, she was selling it to them in buckets, but then they decided to install small pipe networks for more convenience.  She has been providing this service to her neighbors for more than ten years and her children help her to maintain the networks.  She likes her business because of the income and she enjoys helping fulfill the need for water in her neighbors’ homes.  She feels that her business is profitable because it provides constant, steady monthly income.  After seeing the profits derived from it, she plans to continue this business.  She also plans to engage in another business, such as selling spare parts for motorcycles, and thus generate more income.   

This will be her thirteenth loan with the MFP institution.  She is very happy to know that she will have financial support as this will enable her to feel secure in moving her business forward.  In addition, she says that she feels comfortable with her communal bank because she knows her members and regards them as responsible and friendly people.  With the 3000 nuevos soles that she is requesting, she will invest in the maintenance and replacement of the pipe networks, as well as pay for electricity and repair the water pump in order to provide good service.

loans.use: to purchase pipes, pay for electricity, and repair the water pump.

loans.name: Lesnia Yaoska

texts.es:
Lesnia, es una joven de 21 años de edad ,soltera,  de procedencia humilde, originaria de la capital Managua,  es la menor de dos hermanas, su mama es padre y madre al mismo tiempo , la cual trabaja en una empresa empastando cuaderno con mucho sacrificio y esfuerzo ha sostenido el hogar y la educación de sus hijas. Lesnia esta culminando su último año de la carrera Química Farmacéutica. Ella  nos cuenta que escogió esta carrera por que le gusta y además le da al a oportunidad de salir adelante como profesional y ayudar a su familia además de que esta relacionada con los pacientes y de esta manera ayudar a la sociedad.  En los ratos libre Lesnia   ayuda a su madre a atender un negocio familiar es una pequeña mini librería de esta manera consiguen otros ingresos para ayudarse a pagar los gastos de su casa y la universidad aunque las ganancias son muy pocas pero le ayudan a cubrir parte de las necesidades que tienen. 
Ella quiere utilizar el crédito para pagar su curso de titulación y poder graduarse de la carrera Química –Farmacéutica. Aunque ella dice que quiere estudiar  después de graduarse una especialidad en Microbiología que es uno de sus planes a realizar y poner su propia farmacia de esta manera poner en práctica todos los conocimientos adquiridos en la universidad. Con una mirada  sencilla y llena de esperanza Lesnia dice que este crédito le brindara la oportunidad de ver realizado uno de sus mas grande sueños como  es el graduarse y poder darle  a su familia un titulo universitario que sientan orgullosa de ella y que valió la pena los sacrificios durante estos   cuatro años.
texts.en:
Lesnia is a young woman who is 21 years of age, single, and of humble origins. She is from the capital of Managua and the younger of two sisters. Her mother plays the role of both parents and works at a notebook binder company with great sacrifice and effort in order to sustain her household and educate her daughters.

Lesnia is in her final year of completing her degree in pharmacology. She says that she chose this career because she enjoys it and in addition it will give her the opportunity to advance professionally and help her family. She will also be able to assist patients and contribute to society. During her free time, Lesnia helps her mother manage a small family business – a mini bookstore. This enables them to earn additional income to help pay for the household expenses and her university costs since she earns very little income. This helps cover part of her necessities.

Lesnia wants to use this loan to pay for a required course so that she can graduate with a degree in pharmacology. Even though she says that she wants to continue her studies after graduation for a specialization in microbiology, Lesnia says one of her plans is open a her own pharmacy so that she put all of the knowledge she gained at university to good use. With a cheerful outlook filled with hope, Lesnia says this loan will provide the chance for her mother to see one of her greatest dreams fulfilled of seeing her daughter graduate and bring a university degree to the family. Her family is proud of her and the sacrifices they have made the past four years have been worthwhile.

loans.use: to pay for a university course.

loans.name: Monica

texts.en:
Monica lives in Bor. She sells fish and has been in business for three years. She is 32 years old, married, and has four children —two of them are still in school. 

Monica heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer.  This is her fourth loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 1200 SDG in order to purchase fish. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay school fees.

loans.use: buy fish

loans.name: Narine

texts.en:
Narine is 53 years old. She lives in Aragatsavan village with her son. Narine wanted to have stable source of income to sustain her son, so she started to breed cattle.  

Narine has successfully run the farm and expanded it through past years. Now she wants to purchase more livestock, which will allow her to earn more income.  In addition, Narine will use this loan to purchase forage to feed the cattle.  

Narine wants her son to have a better quality of life, and this loan will help her to renovate her house and implement her purpose.

loans.use: buy livestock

loans.name: Sin

texts.en:
Sin is 58 years old. She has a life partner in her spouse and has 4 children: two are married and the others are single. Sin is a local farmer. She grows rice, potatoes and vegetables. She also takes some free time at home to make skewers to sell in bulk to her frequent customers.

Sin is looking for a loan from HKL to purchase a used motorcycle for household use as well as to support the family-owned business. With the rest of the funds, she will use it for her farming process. This loan will improve her business and her living standard.

loans.use: buy a used motorcycle

loans.name: Jurakhon

texts.ru: Чурахон женат и на воспитании имеет одного ребенка. Он очень трудолюбивый и добрый человек. Более 3 -х лет он занимается выращиванием сельхозпродукции. В бизнесе помогает жена. Чурахон хочет расширить свой бизнес, чтобы улучшить свое жилищные условия. Чурахон хотел бы получить займ в размере 500$ США для покупки семян, минеральных удобрений и горюче-смазочных материалов. Чурахон надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en:
Jurakhon is married and is bringing up a child. He is a very hardworking and good man. He has been engaged in cultivation of agricultural products for more than three years. His wife helps him with the business. Jurakhon wants to expand his business, in order to improve their living conditions.

Jurakhon would like to receive a loan in the amount of 500 USD for the purchase of seeds, mineral fertilizers and fuel and lubricants. He hopes for your help and kindness.

loans.use: To buy seeds, mineral fertilizers, fuel and lubricants

loans.name: La Candelaria Group

texts.es:
El comité La Candelaria, son de la zona de la ciudad de San Lorenzo. Son mujeres muy unidas y pagadoras nunca tuvieron problema en el grupo. Ellas son vecinas y amigas y quieren trabajar juntas para poder ayudar a sus familias.
Vicenta tiene una despensa y nos cuenta que le va muy bien, ya que se ha hecho de una clientela bien definida que siempre compra de ella, ya que se dedica a esto hace ya un buen tiempo.  Empezó con un pequeño negocio que gracias a su esfuerzo fue creciendo hasta llegar a lo que es hoy en día.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de bebidas, lácteos, comestibles, panificados y demás artículos que son los que más vende.
texts.en:
The lending group La Candelaria is located in the area of the city of San Lorenzo. They are very united women and borrowers and never have had a problem in the group. They are neighbors and friends and want to work together to help their families. 

Vicenta has a store and tells us that it is doing very well since it has become well-established. Vicenta has a clientell that always buy from her, as she has been dedicated to this business for quite a while. She started with a small business, and thanks to her efforts, it grew into what it is today.

She is requesting a loan for the purchase of beverages, dairy, groceries, baked goods and other items that she sells the the most of.

loans.use: buy staple items to sell

loans.name: Mujeres Trabajadoras Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado mujeres trabajadoras es de la ciudad de Concepción, cuenta con 16 integrantes  en donde todas tienen una pequeña actividad en la cual trabajan. Ellas se sienten muy emocionadas y tienen la esperanza de seguir luchando por salir adelante, buscando el progreso de cada una de ellas y la de su comité.
Nelly es vendedora y nos cuenta que tiene habilidad en las ventas, y es por eso que le va muy bien. Se dedica a la venta de todo tipo de prendas para damas, caballeros y niños. Ella nos cuenta que gracias a su trabajo ha podido ayudar a su familia con los gastos del día a día.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de prendas para damas, caballeros y niños, con lo cual podrá abastecerse y tener un mayor stock para ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
This group called 'Mujeres Trabajadoras' is from the city of Concepción.  The group has 16 members who each have their own small business activity.  They feel very excited and are hopeful that they will be able to keep working hard and getting ahead in life.  They are in search of progress for each and every one of them as well as for their committee.

Nelly is a saleswoman.  She tells us that she is skilled at making sales and so her business is doing very well.  She sells all kinds of ladies', men's and children's clothing.  She tells us that, thanks to her work, she has been able to help her family cover their daily expenses.

Nelly is requesting a loan to buy ladies', men's and children's clothing with which to stock her business so that she has a larger stock of items to offer her customers.

loans.use: to buy clothing to sell

loans.name: Armine

texts.en:
Armine, 34 years old, lives in Partizak village with her parents, two brothers and a sister-in-law. Armine works at the local school as a teacher, while her family has been involved in agriculture, their main source of income, for many years.

Now Armine wants to expand the farm and so is requesting a loan to purchase cattle. She is very hopeful that she will earn more income from cattle-breeding, which will help her not only to create better conditions in the household, but also accrue savings and invest in further expansion of the farm.

loans.use: to purchase cattle.

loans.name: Marita

texts.es:
Marita, de 36 años, es madre soltera, vive en su propia casa junto a sus 02 queridos hijos; Edson de 13 años y John de 08 años a quienes desea brindar un buen futuro. Marita, ha logrado labrar sus tierras para cultivar plantas de cacao para después  volverlas muy productivas;  que luego los lleva a vender hasta los centros de acopio situado en la localidad de Palmapampa, donde los vende al por mayor. Sus cultivos le han dado los ingresos necesarios para mantenerse y sustentar los gastos de educación de sus queridos hijos; es por ello que pone todas sus ganas en sacar adelante sus cultivos.
Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cuidar sus plantaciones, ya que se siente contenta realizando lo que se propone, lleva 16 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es transportar sus productos desde la chacra hasta su comunidad, con el crédito solicitado espera obtener buenos resultados de su producción ya que le dan la facilidad de seguir con sus planes de trabajo. Este será su crédito número 06 con MFP, se compromete a pagar de manera puntual con sus cuotas. En su banco comunal forma parte de la junta directiva lo cual agradece a sus socios por darle la confianza de trabajar con ellos.
Con los 2,000 nuevos soles, comprará fungicidas y abono para realizar el mantenimiento de su siembra.
texts.en:
Marita, 36, is a single mother who lives in her own house with her two dear children, Edison, who is 13, and John, who is 8. She wants to give them a good future. She has succeeded in working her land and making it very productive for cacao cultivation. She takes her harvest to the collection centers located in the town of Palmapampa where she sells it wholesale. Her crops have provided the necessary income to support her dear children and pay for their education. That is why she devotes all her energy to getting ahead in her farming.

What Marita most enjoys about her work is caring for her plantations, since she feels content working to achieve her goals. She has been farming for 16 years and considers the most difficult part transporting her products from the field to her community.  With the loan she has requested she expects to earn a good return on her production since the loan will facilitate following through with her work plans.

This will be her sixth loan with MFP and she is committed to making her payments on time. She is part of the executive committee of her communal bank and she is grateful to the members for having confidence in her ability to work with them. She will use the 2000 nuevos soles to buy fungicides and fertilizer to cover maintenance costs during planting.

loans.use: to buy fungicides and bags of fertilizer.

loans.name: Kuña Pyryry Group

texts.es:
Este grupo de Kuña Pyryry surgió por contacto de una de las integrantes con la Fundación,  el grupo se encuentra en el 11º ciclo, opera con la Fundación desde el año 2008. Ellas son mujeres muy trabajadoras y vieron en el programa de la fundación una gran oportunidad de progreso y desarrollo.
Una de las integrantes del grupo es la Sra. María, ella tiene 5 hijos,  está acompañada con el Sr. Pedro y ella se dedica hace varios años a la cría de pollos. Ella solciita un crédito, el cual utiliza para la compra de insumos y balanceados  y vender a sus clientes,  ella se encuentra  muy agradecida ya que gracias a el crédito que recibe puede mejorar sus ingresos y el de su familia.
Todas las señoras del grupo también  realizan actividades productivas y desean poder seguir trabajando con la institución
texts.en:
This group, Kuña Pyryry, arose from the contact of one of the members with the foundation. It is now in its eleventh cycle and has worked with the foundation since 2008. The members are very hard-working women, and they see in the foundation's program a great opportunity for progress and development. 

One of the members of the group is Señora Maria. She has five children. Her partner is Señor Pedro. She has been raising chickens for a number of years. She is applying for a loan which she will use to purchase supplies and balanced feed for her poultry and to sell to her customers. She is very grateful, since thanks to the loan that she will receive, she can improve her income and that of her family.

All the women in the group also have productive businesses and they want to continue working with the institution.

loans.use: to buy balanced feed for her poultry and also to sell

loans.name: Lima Poty 1 Group

texts.es:
El comité “Lima Poty I” se formó con la unión de varias vecinas de la ciudad de  Santaní. Todas las integrantes del comité desarrollan actividades independientes, pero también hacen actividades que fortalecen su compañerismo. Las integrantes formaron un grupo muy unido y que trabaja dentro de un marco de respeto.
Deolinda es una de las integrantes, ella se dedica a las ventas. Tiene una despensa en la cual tiene todo tipo de productos de primera necesidad, con los que surte a sus vecinos y demás clientes. Ella es muy trabajadora, ya que todos los días empieza su trabajo desde muy temprano por la mañana.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de lácteos, panificados, productos a granel, y demás. Su meta es seguir trabajando para seguir ayudando a su familia.
texts.en:
The 'Lima Poty I' committee was formed when several neighbors from the city of Santaní joined together as a group.  All the members of the committee carry out their own business activities but they also carry out joint activities to strengthen their team spirit.  This is a very united group and its members work within a framework of respect.

Deolinda is a member of this group and she is a saleswoman.  She has a grocery store where she sells all kinds of basic household products to her neighbors and other customers.  She is very hard-working and she starts work very early every morning.

Deolinda is requesting this loan to buy dairy products, baked goods, bulk goods, etc.  Her goal is to continue working to provide for her family.

loans.use: to buy basic household products to sell

loans.name: Majeda

texts.en:
Majeda is a 46-year-old housewife. Her husband works for a private company. They have six children.
Six years ago, Majeda started a small business selling cosmetics products and accessories. Now she is working on adding jewelry to the range of goods she sells. Majeda's business attracts a specific type of customer since she only deals with a few brands whether it’s for cosmetics products or accessories. 
Majeda has applied for a loan in order to buy jewelry to add to her sales business.

loans.use: to buy jewelry for resale.

loans.name: Fawzia

texts.en:
Fawzia is a 28-year-old divorced lady who has one son to support. After her divorce, Fawzia went back to live with her family. For this reason, she felt that she was putting more of a burden on her family as they have her and her son living with them. So Fawzia started working as a cleaner at a school, and opened a small clothing shop to earn more income to help her family and to save up for when her child is grown up.
Fawzia has applied for a loan to buy more clothes for the shop to increase her income.

loans.use: to buy more clothes for her shop.

loans.name: Iman

texts.en:
Iman is a 29-year-old married woman who has six children. Her husband works in a governmental entity.
To be able to support their large family, Iman decided to open a small grocery store to help her husband with the family's financial situation and in the hope of enhancing their living conditions.
Iman has applied for a loan to purchase more goods for her store to increase her income.

loans.use: to purchase more goods for her store.

loans.name: Kurbonoi

texts.ru: Курбоной женат и ответственный отец двоих детей. Она очень трудолюбивая женщина и более 6 лет она занимается купле- продажей женской одежды. В бизнесе помогают дочери. Она приобретает товар 1-2 раза в неделю. Она имеет много постоянных клиентов, а также привозит товар на заказ своим клиентам. Курбоной запрашивает займ в размере 3000 Сомони для покупки новой женской одежды. Он надеется на вашу помощь и милосердие.
texts.en:
Kurbonoi is married and the responsible parent of two children. She is a very hardworking woman and she has been engaged in buying and selling women's clothing for more than six years. Her daughters help with the business. She purchases goods 1-2 times per week. She has many regular customers and also brings in goods on request from her clients. 

Kurbonoi asks for a loan in the amount of 3000 somoni for the purchase of new women's clothing. She hopes for your support and mercy.

loans.use: To buy women's clothing for sale

loans.name: Norma

texts.es:
Norma, de 39 años, es una mujer entusiasta y trabajadora; vive en su propia casa junto a su amado esposo Efraín, de 41 años y sus 02 apreciados hijos; Sofía de 10 años y Jairo de 08 años; a quienes brinda salud y cuidado. Norma, es alegre y bondadosa; se dedica con mucho esmero a la venta productos naturales como el Omnilife; producto que llega a vender a las personas que necesiten cuidar su salud. Norma, gracias a lo eficiente que es con su trabajo, llega a vender sus productos aconsejando de una manera muy sencilla para lo bien que les va a resultar. Sin embargo considera que lo mas difícil es tener que caminar durante todo el día ofreciendo sus productos, de la misma forma que logra terminar rápido sus productos de venta; es por ello que acude a MFP para solicitar un préstamo y que logre cumplir con su objetivo de trabajo, comprando las necesidades de venta para sus clientes. Este será su crédito número 15 con MFP, está dispuesta a realizar sus pagos de forma puntual y pueda solicitar a otro crédito. En su banco comunal es una socia responsable y solidaria con sus compañeros.
Con los 3,000 nuevos soles, comprará sus productos naturales para ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Norma, 39 years old, is an enthusiastic and hard-working woman. She lives in her own house together with her beloved husband Efraín, 41, and her 2 precious children, Sofia, 10, and Jairo, 8, to whom she brings health and care. Norma is happy and kind. She devotes herself with great care to the sale of natural products such as Omnilife, a product that she sells to people who need to take care of their health. Norma, thanks to how efficient she is with her work, sells her products by advising in a very simple manner the good that will result for her customers. Nevertheless, she thinks the most difficult thing is to have to walk all day offering her products, and similarly she manages to quickly run out of products. This is why she comes to MFP to ask for a loan so she may reach her goal for her work, buying the necessities to sell to her customers. This will be her 15th loan with MFP. She is ready to make her payments on time and could ask for another loan. In her communal bank she is a responsible member who is supportive of her colleagues. 

With the 3,000 nuevos soles, she will buy natural products to offer her customers.

loans.use: to buy natural products

loans.name: Heba

texts.en:
Heba is a 21-year-old married lady. Her husband works in a hotel. They have no children yet.
Heba has recently started a small retail business selling home products as a way to have another income and use her free time. She has now applied for a loan to purchase more home products for resale. She hopes to open her own home products shop in the future.

loans.use: to purchase more home products for resale.

loans.name: Ulises Gerardo Del Carmen

texts.es:
Ulises es un señor de 46 años de edad y vive con su familia en la comunidad de San Carlos, en la provincia de Alajuela. Esta comunidad rural presenta mucho potencial de desarrollo, ya que a través de las actividades agrícolas ya que tiene un clima caliente, lo que permite la producción de ciertas frutas que se desarrollan con más fuerza en este tipo de clima asi como la siembra de mango, el melón y otros propios de la zona, es que ha logrado desarrollar actividades conexas y de servicios en la comunidad, tales como el ganado de engorde y la oportunidad de pequeños comercios y microempresas entre otros. Localidad que se caracteriza por sus parques nacionales, su extensa variedad en la flora y en la fauna. 

Desde hace algunos años Ulises se dedica a la siembra de piña. Se ha visto apoyado y ayudado por su familia. Los vecinos de la comunidad se han mostrado satisfechos con la cosecha y se han beneficiado, muchos de ellos con la obtención de trabajo, el cual les ha permitido tener más ingresos económicos para el brindarles a sus familias una mejor calidad de vida.

Ulises está solicitando el monto de 1, 000,000.00 (Un millón de colones), para darle asistencia y mantenimiento a su plantación de piña por medio de agroquímicos, abono y mano de obra de los demás colaboradores de la siembra de este producto.

Ulises es miembro de la Empresa de Crédito Comunal de Los Ángeles de Pital S.A, este será su primer préstamo razón por la cual está  muy agradecida, por las oportunidades  de acceso al crédito que esta le brinda y poder llevar a cabo sus proyectos de vida.
texts.en:
Ulises is 46 years old and lives with his family in the community of San Carlos in the province of Alajuela.  This rural community exhibits a lot of potential for development since there are already a lot of agricultural activities because it has a hot climate. The climate permits the production of certain fruits that grow with greater strength such as mangos, melons, and other fruits native to the area.  This has encouraged the development of other connected activities and services in the community, such as the fattening of cattle and the opportunities for small businesses and micro-enterprizes among other things.  The area is characterized by its national parks and its extensive variety of flora and fauna.

Ulises has dedicated himself to the cultivation of pineapples for many years.  His family has given him support and help.  Neighbors have shown satisfaction with the harvest and have benefited, many of them by obtaining work, which has permitted them to have more financial income that allows them to offer their families a better quality of life. 

Ulises is soliciting the amount of 1,000,000.00 (one million Costa Rican colones) in order to give assistance and management to his pineapple plantation through agrochemicals, fertilizer, and hired hands to help with the harvesting of this product.  

Ulises is a member of the "Empresa de Credito Comunal de Los Angeles de Pital S.A."  This will be his first loan, and he is therefore very grateful
for the opportunities for credit access that this offers him and that will enable him to carry out his life's projects.

loans.use: to pay for agrochemicals, fertilizer, and hired hands to help with the harvesting of pineapples.

loans.name: Antonela Group

texts.es:
El grupo  Antonela lo conforman tres personas trabajadoras y emprendedoras una de ellas es Lida del Carmen quien se dedica al comercio de nacatamales y plantas desde hace 6 años e invertirá el crédito en plantas ornamentales y en productos para realizar  nacatamales cerdo, pollo, arroz, maíz, leña…etc.
Las otras integrantes son  Johana quien se dedica a la venta de ropa desde hace 5 años y  Maritza del Carmen quien se dedica al comercio de platas desde hace 2 años.
texts.en:
The Antonela group is made up of three hardworking and enterprising people. One of them is Lida del Carmen, who has worked for six years selling plants and nacatamales (a Nicaraguan snack consisting of steamed meat and vegetables in banana or maize leaves). She will invest the loan in buying ornamental plants and the things she needs to make nacatamales, including pork, chicken, rice, maize, fuel etc.

The other members of Antonela are Johana, who has been selling clothes for five years, and Maritza del Carmen, who has been selling plants for two years.

loans.use: to buy ornamental plants and the things she needs to make nacatamales (a Nicaraguan dish), including pork, chicken, rice, maize, fuel etc.

loans.name: Shefaa

texts.en:
Shefaa is a 57-year-old widow who works to support her family.

She owns a grocery store where she sells drinks, snacks, and also macaroni, canned tuna and others. She has applied for this loan to add more food products to the store where her son also helps her.

loans.use: to add more food products to the store

loans.name: Idigul

texts.ru: Идигул замужем и любящая мать четверых детей. Муж пенсионер. Более 10 лет она занимается купле- продажей носков и обуви в торговом центре. Приобретает товар 2-3 раза в неделю. Она хочет расширить свой бизнес и с этой целью запрашивает займ для покупки товара. Она надеется на вашу помощь и милосердие.
texts.en:
Idigul is married and the loving mother of four children. Her husband is a pensioner. Idigul has been engaged in buying and selling socks and shoes at the mall for more than ten years. She purchases goods 2-3 times per week. 

Idigul wants to expand her business and for this purpose requests a loan for the purchase of merchandise. She hopes for your help and compassion.

loans.use: To buy merchandise

loans.name: María Rosmery

texts.es:
María tiene 22 años de edad, vive con su compañero de vida y su hija en una zona rural del país. Ella tiene cinco años de dedicarse a la venta de pupusas, aprendió el oficio con una vecina a la que le ayudaba a trabajar. Su negocio es muy reconocido en la zona por elaborar pupusas de excelente calidad ya un buen precio, ofrece el mejor servicio del lugar, ya que siempre recibe a los clientes con una sonrisa en el rostro.

María compra los insumos para elaborar las pupusas, al por mayor y viaja hasta una ciudad del oriente del país. El préstamo que solicita es para comprar una plancha y hacerle arreglos al local donde vende las pupusas y compra los insumos. Con la inversión ella brindara una mejor atención a los clientes y tendrá un lugar más seguro para su negocio. Al mismo tiempo mejoran sus ingresos, su forma de vida y se proyectara hacer cada día mejor. Lo que más desea María es que su negocio sea fuerte, para generar mayores ingresos y brindar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
María is 22 years old and she lives with her life partner and her daughter in a rural area of the country. She has been selling pupusas [stuffed corn tortillas] for five years and learned the trade with a neighbor whom she helped to work. Her business is well-known in the area for preparing high quality pupusas at a good price. She offers the best service around, as she always greets customers with a smile on her face.

María buys the ingredients for her pupusas wholesale and travels to a city in the east of the country. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy a griddle and repair the place where she sells her pupusas, as well as purchase her ingredients. With the investment, she will provide better service to her customers and have a safer place for her business. At the same time, her income and her way of life will improve and she will plan to make a better future. What María wants most of all is for her business to be strong in order to generate greater income and to provide a better quality of life for her family.

loans.use: to buy a griddle and repair the place where she sells her pupusas and buys her ingredients

loans.name: Solidarios Group

texts.es:
Ana cuenta con 50 años de edad, es casada una señora muy eficiente porque dice que a pesar de que atiende  a su familia le gusta trabajar y a si ayudar a su familia, tiene 5 hijos todos están estudiando su hijo Luis el mayor esta en su carrera de administración de empresas, Elías esta en la carrera de ingeniero en sistema, Saide esta en la preparatoria, jorge y Juan están en el cbta ella espera que todos sus hijos puedan concluir sus estudios, su esposo se llama Luis es maestro de primaria.

Ella se dedica al comercio cuenta con una fonda de comida ya tiene 7 años con el negocio y dice que le funcionado muy bien y con su negocio y la ayuda de su préstamo le esta yendo muy bien esta muy contenta con el apoyo brindado, lo cual e invertirá su préstamo en la compra de los insumos que utiliza para la elaboración de la comida como son: verduras, jitomate, chile, gas, carne, pollos, etc.

Ana pertenece al grupo solidarios el cual esta integrado por 11 personas dos hombres y nueve mujeres los cuales todos cuenta con un negocio, a continuación serán mencionados: Epifanía, Luz Maria, Margarita, Mercedes, Emilia, Eugenio, Mercedes, Leticia, Saúl, Ma de los Ángeles y Edith, todos cuentan con una actividad comercial como son: frutas y verduras, cosméticos, comida, abarrotes, refrescos, productos naturistas, etc.
texts.en:
Ana is 50 years old and married. She is a very efficient woman because, she says, aside from caring for her family, she likes to work and thus help her family. She has 5 children and all are studying. Her oldest, a son, Luis, is studying business administration, Elias is studying to be a systems engineer, Saide is in secondary school, and Jorge and Juan are in vocational high school. She hopes that all her children will be able to conclude their studies. Her husband, Luis, is a primary school teacher. 

Ana has been a merchant with a food catering business for 7 years. She says that it is going very well and that her loan has helped her and that she is is very satisfied with the support provided. She will invest her loan in the purchase of supplies that she uses to make her food such as vegetables, tomatoes, chiles, gas, meat, chicken, etc

Ana belongs to a communal bank that is made up of 11 persons, two men and 9 women, all of whom have businesses. To mention  them, they are Epifanía, Luz Maria, Margarita, Mercedes, Emilia, Eugenio, Mercedes, Leticia, Saúl, Ma de los Ángeles y Edith. Their businesses deal with fruit and vegetables, cosmetics, food, groceries, drinks, natural products, etc.

loans.use: to buy supplies such as vegetables, tomatoes, chiles, gas, meat, chickens, etc.

loans.name: Flor Del Campo Group

texts.es:
Bulfrana cuenta con 30 años de edad, es casada tiene 3 hijos los cuales están estudiando Itzayana esta cursando 5° de primaria, Yazmín, esta en 2° de primaria, Oscar esta en preescolar, su esposo se llama oscar es campesino.

Ella se dedica al comercio de venta de productos de abarrotes ya tiene 2 años con la tienda lo cual dice que no es grande su tienda pero que la sabido sacar adelante lo cual invertirá su préstamo en la compra de los productos como son: leche, jugos, aceites, refrescos, sopas, chiles, etc. Doña Bulfrana espera que el negocio vaya incrementado y ella pondrá todo de su parte para que le funcione esta muy contenta con la ayuda brindada.

Bulfrana pertenece al grupo flor del campo el cual esta integrado por 11 personas todas son mujeres trabajadoras a continuación serán mencionadas: Yaneli, Maria de Jesús, Divina, Diana, Flaviana, Luz Divina, Gilberta, Bertina, claudia, Maria gionelli y Bulfrana, todas realizan una actividad comercial como: venta de producto de temporada, pollos, pescados, carnes, verduras, coco, dulces, ropa, pan, libros, etc.
texts.en:
Bulfrana is 30 years old, she is married and she has 3 children who go to school: Itzayana and Yazmín are attending the 5th and the 2nd year of primary school respectively, while Oscar is in preschool. Her husband’s name is Oscar and he is a farmer.
She sells general products, and she has been running her shop for 2 years already. She says although her shop isn’t big, it has help her getting ahead. She will invest her loan in the purchase of products such as milk, juices, oil, drinks, soups and chili peppers. Bulfrana hopes that her activity will improve, and she will do her part in order for her activity to work. She is really happy for the help received.
Bulfrana is a member of the group Flor del Campo (Country Flower). The group is composed of 11 very hardworking women whose names are Yaneli, Maria de Jesús, Divina, Diana, Flaviana, Luz Divina, Gilberta, Bertina, Claudia. They all engage in retail, selling items such as seasonal products, chickens, fish, meat, vegetables, coconuts, sweets, clothes, bread and books.

loans.use: To buy milk, juices, oil, drinks, soups and chili peppers.

loans.name: Solidario Fuente De Agua Viva 2 Group

texts.es:
Solidario Fuente de Agua Viva 2.

la señora Clara, de 47 años de edad,Mayra Carolina 23 años de edad, Vilma Raquel de 28 años de edad,
Doña Clara se dedica a la elavoracion y venta de Güipiles desde hace 8 años,ella esta muy contenta porque el credito anterior le fue muy bien,y logro agrandar un poco mas su negocio,haora ella esta solicitando este credito para la compra de materia prima para seguir con su negocio, al igual que la siguiente socias tambien se dedican a la elavoracion y venta de Güipiles, y tambien estan solicitando este credito para la compra de materia prima para la confeccion de Güipiles,esperan que kiva les pueda dar este apoyo que nececitan para poder superarse poco a poco.
texts.en:
Solidario Fuente de Agua Viva II.

Clara, 47 years old, Mayra Carolina, 23 years old, and Vilma Raquel, 28 years old.

Clara has worked at the creation and sale of traditional blouses for 8 years.  She is very happy because her previous loan went very well, and she managed to grow her business a bit more.  Now she is requesting this loan to buy raw materials to continue with her business.  The other partners also work at making and selling traditional blouses, and are also requesting loans to buy raw materials to create traditional blouses.  They hope that Kiva can give them the support they need to get ahead little by little.

loans.use: to buy raw materials to make woven garments.

loans.name: Raul

texts.es:
Raúl, de 33 años, es un joven soltero, vive en su propia casa y tiene planes por realizar en el lapso del tiempo. Raúl, es un hombre campesino desde muy joven empezó con los trabajos de la agricultura actividad que gracias a sus padres llego a aprender durante 20 años. Raúl ahora cuenta con su propia chacra donde cultiva plantas de cacao. En tiempos de cosecha recibe la ayuda de sus vecinos que llega a extraer rápido los frutos; después los lleva a comercializar a los centros de acopio ubicado en la localidad de Palmapampa  donde los vende a buen precio. Sin embargo considera difícil el no poder combatir con las plagas que aquejan su siembra; desde que se enteró sobre los préstamos que facilitaba MFP, no dudo y se acercó a las oficinas y les comento sobre los problemas que afectaban sus producción; de esa manera los prestamistas le dieron la oportunidad de seguir con los planes de trabajo a la que Raúl se dedica. Este será su crédito número 01 con MFP, está dispuesto a ser puntual con sus cuotas de pago para que en otro momento pueda acceder a otro.  En su banco comunal es un socio colaborador.
Con los 1,000 nuevos soles, podrá comprar fertilizantes para elaborar el mantenimiento de sus plantaciones.
texts.en:
Raúl, 33, is a single young man. He lives in his own house and he has plans to carry out in the course of time. Raúl has been a farmer since he was very young. He began with farm work thanks to his parents, who taught him for 20 years. Raúl now has his own small farm where he grows cacao plants. At harvest times, he receives help from his neighbors, who come to quickly pick the produce. He then brings it to sell at the distribution centers located in the town of Palmapampa, where he sells it at a good price. Nevertheless, he thinks it is difficult not to be able to combat the infestations from which his crops suffer. From the time he found out about the loans that MFP facilitated, he did not hesitate, and went to the offices and told them about the problems that affected his production. In this way the lenders gave him the opportunity to continue with his plans for the work that he does. This will be his first loan with MFP. He is ready to make his payments on time so that at another point he can get another loan. In his communal bank, he is a collaborative member.

With the 1,000 nuevos soles, he will be able to buy fertilizers to maintain his crops.

loans.use: to buy natural fertilizers.

loans.name: Afnan

texts.en:
Afnan is a 24-year-old married lady who has one baby daughter.

Afnan is a university student who wants to graduate and work in her field, so she has applied for a loan to pay her semester fees.

loans.use: to pay for her semester fees.

loans.name: Suhrob

texts.ru: Сухроб женат и ответственный отец троих детей. Более 16 лет Сухроб занимается предоставлением услуг ремонта автомашины. А также купле- продажи запчастей. Имеет собственную точку, которую приобрел на сумму 9000 Сомони. Также Сухроб переоборудовал гараж в мастерскую, где также ремонтирует  автомашины. Сухроб запрашивает займ в размере 8000 Сомони для покупки запчастей с целью расширения бизнеса.
texts.en:
Suhrob is married and the responsible father of three children. He has been engaged in the provision of car repair services for more than 16 years. He also purchases and sells spare parts. Surhob has his own premises, which he purchased for the sum of 9000 somoni. He further purchased a garage to use as a workshop, where he repairs cars. 

Suhrob requests a loan in the amount of 8000 somoni for the purchase of spare parts with the purpose of expanding his business.

loans.use: to buy spare parts in order to expand his business

loans.name: Rosa De Castillas Group

texts.es:
Emunda cuenta con 34 años de edad, es casada 4 hijos los cuales, pero solo estudian 3 Rosa Isela esta cursando 3° de secundaria, Consuelo esta en 5° de primaria, Yaneli en 4° de primaria y  Luís Manuel cuenta con un año de edad, su esposo se llama Andrés es campesino.

Ella se dedica al comercio de frutas y verduras tienes 5 meses con el negocio dice que le va muy bien  e invertirá su préstamo en la compra de frutas y verduras como son: chile, jitomate, cebolla, manzanas, naranjas, etc. Ella espera que el negocio que apenas inicio le vaya muy bien ya que es una fuente de ingresos para ayudar y darles una buena educación a sus hijos.

Emunda pertenece al grupo rosa de castilla le pusieron así por que el grupo esta integrado por 12 mujeres las cuales todas son trabajadoras, a continuación serán mencionadas: Paula, Irma, Maribel, Vianey, Claudia, Teresa, Mariana, Edén, Luz, Nelly, Patricia, Todas realizan una actividad comercial como son: venta de ropa, refrescos, verduras, frutas, pollos, productos de abarrotes, pescados, comida, etc.
texts.en:
Emunda is 34 years old, she is married and she has 4 children, 3 of whom go to school: Rosa Isela is attending the 3rd year of secondary school, Consuelo and Yaneli are attending the 5th and the 4th years of primary school respectively, while Luís Manuel is only one year old. Her husband is a farmer and his name is Andrés.

She sells fruits and vegetables, an activity she has been running for 5 months and she says things are going very well, and that she will invest her loan in the purchase of fruits and vegetables such as chili peppers, onions, apples and oranges among other products. She hopes that the activity she has just started will go very well because this is a source of income she needs to help providing her children with a good education.

Emunda is a member of the group Rosa de Castilla (Rose of Castilla); this group bears this name because it is composed of 12 hardworking women, whose names are: Paula, Irma, Maribel, Vianey, Claudia, Teresa, Mariana, Edén, Luz, Nelly, Patricia. They all engage in different retail activities selling items such as clothes, drinks, vegetables, fruits, chickens, groceries, fish and meals among other items.

loans.use: To buy  chili peppers, onions, apples and oranges.

loans.name: La Presa Group

texts.es:
Yeimi es originaria de una comunidad donde la principal actividad económica es el cultivo d flor de noche buena ya que este pueblo es el primer exportador de esta flor y también es muy conocido por que muy cerca de ahí hay un paraje turístico llamado zona arqueológica de Zirahuato. 

Ella tiene 32 años de edad y está casada con José Luis el cual es albañil comenta que tiene 4 hijos los cuales 3 estudian y por eso ella y su esposo trabajan para darles una mejor calidad de vida ya que ella nada mas estudio hasta tercero de secundaria porque sus papas ya no la pudieron seguir apoyando por falta de recursos.

Para salir adelante con los gastos del hogar ella a diario hace gorras, bolsas, carteras pero estás son muy peculiares ya que las hace del anillo que tiene las latas de abre fácil dice que las recicla y con estambre o hilo grueso las va entretejiendo y les va dando forma de bolsas, carteras, mochilas, gorras etc. Y que abeces hay personas que ya venden los anillos por kilos. 

Ella está pidiendo un crédito para seguir comprando material como estambre, cierres de diferentes tamaños, hilos gruesos, ganchos y anillo de aluminio, dice que las vende en la capital del país donde las vende a muy buen precio y que en varias ocasiones ha mandado a vender a Estados Unidos donde le han mandado hacer pedidos sus familiares, también dice que abeces hace costuras como servilletas para adornar o para poner las tortillas, carpetas, almohadones, manteles etc. Dice que está muy contenta de trabajar con la financiera por que poco a poco se está superando y que pronto ella quisiera hacer su propia casa ya que viven en casa de su suegra.
texts.en:
Yeimi is from a community where the primary economic activity is the cultivation of Poinsettia’s, since the town is one of the primary exporters of this flower.  It is also well known because it is very close to a popular tourist spot called the architectural zone of Zirahuato.

She is 32 years old and is married to José Luis, who is in construction.  She tells us that she has 4 children, 3 of whom are in school.  She and her husband work very hard to give them a better standard of living as she herself only studied to the third grade because her parents were unable to keep supporting her due to a lack of resources.

In order to get ahead with the household’s daily expenses, she makes caps, bags, and purses, but they are very peculiar in that she makes them from the rings off easy-open tin cans.  She tells us that she recycles them and interweaves them with yarn or heavy thread, giving them the form of bags, purses, satchels, caps, etc.  Sometimes there are people who sell the rings by the kilo.

She is requesting a loan to continue buying materials such as yarn, fasteners in various sizes, heavy threads, pins and aluminum rings.  She states that she sells them in the country’s capital, where they go for a good price.  On various occasions, she has sent her products to sell in the United States, where her relatives have sent for orders.  She also notes that she has on occasion sewn items such as decorative napkins, or for placing the tortillas, carpets, cushions, tablecloths, etc.

She states that she is very happy to work with the financing company because, little by little, she is getting ahead.  She would like to have her own home soon, as they are now living in her mother-in-law’s house.

loans.use: to make knit bags, caps, purses and sewn handicrafts.

loans.name: Ahsan

texts.en:
Ahsan is a 30-year-old internally displaced person who lives in the Bilasuvar IDP settlement with his wife and two children. He is farmer who has raised seasonal fruits and vegetables for the last four years. During that time, Ahsan has gained enough skills and experience  to run his business. He chose his business because it is profitable and fresh fruits and vegetables are in high demand since people use them every day and they are healthy. Many Azerbaijan national dishes, such as pilau and dolma, are made with vegetables, and fresh fruits are served on every Azerbaijan family table along with fresh punch. Ahsan usually sells his crop in the central bazaar and earns a monthly income of 300 AZN.

Ahsan is requesting a 1,500 AZN loan to expand his business and produce more fruit and vegetables to meet market demand. He will use his loan to buy new garden tools, seeds, and fertilizer. He has a good credit history and this will be his fourth loan.

loans.use: to buy garden tools, seeds, and fertilizer

loans.name: Soly

texts.en:
Soly is 26 and married. She lives with her husband and their one child in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She has been running a coffee shop for over two years and earns approximately 3 USD per day. Soly's husband runs a battery-charging business for the villagers and he generates about 10 USD daily. 

Soly is requesting a 500 USD loan to purchase groceries to sell in order to improve her family’s economy. Her loan would enable her to generate more income to support the family. In the future, Soly would like to expand her grocery store and send her child to a good school.

loans.use: to purchase groceries to sell

loans.name: Abduchalil

texts.ru: Абдучалил женат и ответственный отец одного ребенка. Он очень трудолюбивый и добрый человек. Более 5 лет он занимается купле- продажей риса. Помимо того он занимается купле- продажей скота. В обороте имеет 2 голов крупного рогатого скота. Абдучалил хотел бы получить займ для ремонта своего дома. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Abduchalil is married and is a responsible father of one child. He is a very hardworking and kind man. He has been buying and reselling rice for more than five years. Besides that he also buys and sells cattle. He has two heads of large horned cattle in his stock. Abduchalil wants to get a loan to repair his house. He hopes for your help and kindness.

loans.use: to repair his house.

loans.name: Anatolia

texts.es: Anatolia, de 36 años, vive en su propia casa junto  a su esposo Sergio de de 42 años, quien le apoya con los gastos de sus  03 adorados hijos. Anatolia, es una mujer muy perseverante y se dedica con mucho empeño al cultivo de café junto a su esposo; ambos saben el deber de  luchar por tener la mejor producción puesto que sus vecinos de su localidad también producen café. Anatolia lleva 24 años realizando esta actividad y comenta que para ella es muy embarazoso tener que combatir con las plagas que abaten sus plantaciones. Es por ello que acude a las oficinas de MFP para que le ayuden con los planes de trabajo que se propone a realizar para no dañen sus siembras. Juana, espera el apoyo de los financistas para que pueda lograr con sus planes de trabajo y con el tiempo llegar a obtener la mejor cosecha de toda su localidad. Este será su crédito número 02 con MFP, por el cual asegura cumplir fielmente con sus compromisos de pago, además esta conforme por la responsabilidad y puntualidad que ejercen cada de uno de sus socios, de su banco comunal. Con los 2,000 nuevos soles, servirá para darle mantenimiento a su plantaciones de café, por lo que contratará peones, con la finalidad de prevenir cualquier evento que pueda repercutir en su produccón.
texts.en:
Anatolia, 36, lives in her own home along with her spouse Sergio, 42, who helps with the expenses for their three beloved children.  Anatolia is a very persistent woman and very dedicated to her work of growing coffee with her husband.  They both know they need to struggle to have the best production since their local neighbors also produce coffee.  Anatolia has been working 24 years in the industry and she says that it is very distressing to have to fight pests that bring down their crops.

She came to the offices of Kiva partner Microfinanzas Prisma (MFP) to receive help with proposed plans to protect their crops.  She hopes for the support of financiers so that she can carry out work plans and eventually produce the best harvest of the entire town.

This will be her second loan through MFP, and Anatolia promises to faithfully adhere to terms of repayment.  She will be as responsible and punctual as all of the other community bank's members are.  The $750 (2,000 soles) will help to maintain her coffee crops and to hire laborers, with the aim of preventing any event which could adversely affect their manufacturing productivity.

loans.use: to hire laborers.

loans.name: Eida

texts.en:
Eida is a 48-year-old married woman from Madaba, Jordan and a mother of five children.

Eida sells clothes and she is requesting a loan of 600 JD to purchase more quantities for business purposes. She is looking to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase clothes for business purposes

loans.name: Mathayel

texts.en:
Mathayel is a 44-year-old married woman from Madaba, Jordan.

Mathayel is looking to improve her family's living conditions, thus she is requesting a loan of 800 JD to do some maintenance on her home.

loans.use: to do home maintainence

loans.name: Muna

texts.en:
Muna is a conservative person so she is unwilling to upload her picture on the internet. The man in the photo is her nephew.

Muna is a 40-year-old married woman from Madaba, Jordan. She has a home-based project in which she sells clothes to the neighbors and friends.

Muna is requesting a loan of 400 JD to purchase clothes for business purposes  with an aspiration of improving her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase clothes for business purposes

loans.name: Aurora Group

texts.es:
Este grupo se llama “Aurora”, es de la comunidad de San Pablo Tlalchichilpa, el grupo lo integran 3 mujeres y 3 hombres muy trabajadores, cada uno de los integrantes de este grupo son casados, y tienen a su familia, y cada uno de ellos(as) se esfuerza día a día por sacarlas adelante, ellos se dedican algunos a la venta de zapatos por catálogo, compra de materia prima para elaborar bordados, compra de plástico para invernadero, compra de material para carpintería, en fin todos ellos tienen actividades encaminadas al comercio, lo hacen con la finalidad de obtener ganancias y ayudar cuando se pueda con los gastos de su hogar y contribuir con los gastos de los hijos en la escuela o con la despensa en la casa, también porque no tienen un empleo fijo que les deje un sueldo y desean invertir parte del tiempo en algo que sea productivo y puedan apoyar a sus parejas para que juntos salgan adelante con todas las necesidades que actualmente se tienen, cabe mencionar que las personas de este grupo son muy responsables y trabajadoras, muy amables y concientes de la responsabilidad que se tiene al solicitar un préstamo, les gusta emprender para mejorar su vida. 

La comunidad de San Pablo es una comunidad con mucha vegetación, además tiene una presa muy grande que abastece en gran medida las necesidades de la comunidad, en San Pablo se cuenta con servicios como agua, clínica, escuelas y transporte continuo hacia el municipio, además de que es una comunidad muy poblada, en fin es una bella comunidad. 

El grupo decidió ponerle “Aurora” porque es el nombre de una de las personas que organizó el grupo, entonces fue decisión de todos los miembros que sería un buen nombre para recordar que la señora Aurora emprendió nuevas cosas que les beneficiaría a todos, ésta es la segunda vez que el grupo pide un préstamo a Fundacion Realidad, sin embargo, la señora Aurora esta vez decidio no pedir un préstamo, y es por eso que no aparece en la lista de los integrantes. 
Los nombres de las seis integrantes son: 
1.-Verónica, tiene 29 años, quien solicita su crédito para comprar zapatos de hombre y mujer para vender.
2.-Gilberta, de 52 años, quien solicita el préstamo para compra de tela, hilos, estambre y encaje para la elaboración y venta de bordados.
3.-Librado de 47 años solicita su crédito para la compra de plástico para un invernadero de nopales 
4.-J. Felix 46 años solicita su crédito para la elaboración de frituras.
5.-Tomás de 42 años, quien solicita el crédito para compra de madera para empleo en su carpintería.
6.-Ma. del Carmen de 49 años, ella pide el crédito compra de tela, hilo, encaje y servilletas pintadas para elaborar bordados y vender.

 El representante del grupo se llama Librado, él tiene 47 años de edad, él terminó de estudiar la primaria, en sus tiempos libres se dedica a hacer trabajos de albañilería, plomería y electricidad y está casado desde hace 24 años con la señora María de Lourdes que se dedica al hogar, juntos tienen 3 hijos, el mayor de 23 años que es casado, la que sigue tiene 21 años, es soltera y está trabajando y el menor de ellos tiene 20 años y también está trabajando, el señor Librado y su esposa viven en casa propia es decir es de ellos y no pagan renta. 

El motivo por el que el señor Librado decide unirse a este grupo es porque en él ve una motivación para emprender un negocio y para que sus compañeros de grupo que necesitan dinero también pudieran emprender. "Soy una persona muy optimista me gusta ayudar a la gente y decirles que le echen ganas que todo lo que quieran hacer siempre es posible si buscamos la manera" Dice el señor Librado "Mi actividad la realizo de la siguiente manera: cuando reciba el dinero de mi préstamo voy a ir a comprar los nopales por penca en mi municipio, lo demás del dinero lo voy a invertir en construir el invernadero que sería el plástico y los soportes, luego ya que halla construido mi invernadero voy a sembrar los nopales y abonarlos con estiércol de res y borrego que sirve de abono natural, y de vez en cuando los tendré que regarlos porque si necesitan agua pero poca. Cuando crezcan los voy a cortar y los voy a llevar al mercado para distribuirlo con los comerciantes del municipio para recuperar lo que voy a invertir, espero y me vaya muy bien."

El señor Librado dice que hasta ahora no ha tenido ninguna dificultad para llevar a cabo su actividad, no ha tenido enfermedades y en general le ha ido bien.

Las metas que el señor Librado tiene en mente son muy concretas, a él le gustaría hacer su negocio en grande, hacer un invernadero grande y distribui en mayoreo, quiere llenar su terreno de nopales y hacer de este actividad, su principal actividad productiva.

"A mí me motiva mucho que las personas que ni siquiera nos conocen tengan la bondad de apoyarnos en nuestro negocio, además me va a salir todo muy bien, porque investigué las condiciones de la tierra en la que vivo y si se puede sembrar nopales, esta inversión me va ayudar a darle una mejor vida a mi familia y sacar para el sustento diario" -Comenta el Señor Librado.

El préstamo que le otorga la institución, será de gran ayuda para que la señor cumpla sus metas y siga progresando.
texts.en:
This group is named Aurora and is from the community of San Pablo Tlalchichilpa. The group consists of three women and three men, all hardworking. Every one of the group members is married and has a family, and every one of them works makes an effort day by day to get ahead. Some sell shoes by mail order, buy raw materials to make embroidery, buy plastic for greenhouses, buy carpentry materials. In summary all of them have activities geared around commerce, and they do them with the goal of making a profit. When they can they help with household expenses and contribute to school costs for the children or with the household pantry. Also, because they don't have fixed employment with salaries and want to invest some of their time in something productive and support their partners, so that they can continue on with all the necessities that they have now, it's worth mentioning that the people of this group are very responsible and hard working, very friendly and conscious of their responsibility in requesting a loan. This undertaking to improve their lives appeals to them. 

The San Pablo community is an area with a lot of vegetation. Furthermore it has a very large reservoir which supplies the necessities of the community in large measure. In San Pablo they count on services like water, clinics, schools, and continuous transport to town. Beyond all that it is a well settled area, and to top it off a beautiful community. 

The group decided to call itself "Aurora" because this is the name of one of the people who organized the group. It was the decision of all the group members that it would be a good name to remember that Señora Aurora took on new things that would benefit everyone. This is the second time the group has asked for a loan, however, Aurora decided this time not to ask for a loan, and that is why her name is not among the list of participants.

The names of the six members are: 
1. Verónica is 29 years old and is asking for this loan to buy men's and women's shoes to sell. 
2. Gilberta is 52 years old and is requesting the loan to buy fabric, thread, yarn and lace to make and sell embroidery. 
3. Librado is 47 years old and requests his loan to buy plastic for a greenhouse for cacti. 
4. J. Felix is 46 years old and is requesting a loan to make fried food. 
5. Tomás is 42 years old and is asking for the loan to buy wood for use in his carpentry shop. 
6. Ma. del Carmen is 49 years old and she is asking for the loan to buy cloth, thread, lace and painted napkins to make embroidery for sale. 

Librado is the representative of the group. He is 47 years old and finished elementary school. In his free time he does bricklaying, plumbing and electrical jobs. He has been married for 24 years to María de Lourdes, who is a house wife. Together they have three children, the oldest of whom is 23 and married, and second oldest is 21, single and working, and the youngest of them is 20 years old and also works. Librado and his wife live in their own home - that is to say, they own it - and they do not pay rent. 

Librado's motivation for joining this group is because he saw a motive to launch a business and so that the other group members, who also need money, can also participate in this undertaking. "I am a very optimistic person. I like to help people and tell them that when they do their best, everything they want to do is always possible if they look for a way." Librado says, "I do my work in the following way: when I receive money from my loan I am going to buy cactus stalks in town. The rest of the money I am going to invest in building a greenhouse which will be plastic and a supporting frame. Then when I've built my greenhouse I'm going to plant the cacti and fertilize them with cow and sheep dung, which works as a natural fertilizer. And once in a while I will have to water them because they need water, but very little. When they are grown I will cut them and I will take them to the market to distribute to businesses in town - to make back what I'm going to invest, I hope, and it will be well with me."

Librado says that until now he has not had any difficulty completing his jobs; he hasn't had any illnesses and in general things go well for him. 

Librado has very concrete goals in mind. He would like to run his business on a large scale, build a big greenhouse and sell wholesale. He wants to fill his land with cacti and make this job his primary productive activity. 

"It really motivates me that people that don't even know us have the kindness to support us in our businesses. Plus everything will go well for me because I've researched the conditions of the land where I live and if I can plant cacti, this investment will help me give a better life to my family and get daily sustenance," comments Librado. 

The loan granted by the institution will be a big help so that this man can accomplish his goals and keep making progress.

loans.use: to buy cacti and materials to buy a greenhouse.

loans.name: Khadeeja

texts.en:
Khadeeja is a 31-year-old married woman. Her husband works for a private company.

Khadeeja wanted to help her husband in supporting the family, so she started a small business selling clothes and artificial plants, basically to neighbors and relatives. Depending on word of mouth, Khadeeja is getting more and more customers.

Now she has applied for a loan to improve the quality of products she sells and get new clothes and more artificial plants and flowers.

loans.use: get new clothes and more artificial plants and flowers to sell.

loans.name: Hiyam

texts.en:
Hiyam is a conservative person, so she asked her husband to appear in the photo instead of her, hoping that Kiva lenders would understand the reason.

Hiyam, 43 years old, is a married woman. Her husband Rezeq, 48 years old, works in a stationery and toy shop that they both own. They have nine sons and daughters.

Hiyam has applied for this loan to renew the registration of the shop so they can continue working in it and having an income to support their big family.

loans.use: to renew the registration of the shop

loans.name: Siham

texts.en:
Siham, 49 years old, is a married woman. She is married to Ahmad who is a plumber, and they have three sons.

Siham has been running a small retail business selling clothes at home for three years now. Recently she was not able to get more goods to sell, but now since she is almost out of products she has applied for a loan to buy more clothes for all ages.

loans.use: to buy more clothes for all ages.

loans.name: Samira

texts.en:
Samira is a conservative person, so she asked her husband to take her place in the photo.

Samira is a 32-year-old married lady. Her husband Osama works in a governmental entity in the daytime. In the evening he comes back home to help his wife in her business which is selling birds, mostly pigeons. 

Samira has applied for a loan to buy more birds to increase their income so they can support their four sons and daughters.

loans.use: to buy more birds

loans.name: Orlando

texts.es: Orlando, de 37 años es un joven alegre y valeroso, vive en cuarto alquilado, ya tiene las esperanzas de seguir esforzándose para poder obtener una buena estadía. Orlando, es un hombre de lucro, se dedica a  proveer  herramientas de construcción como: fierros, cementos, carretillas, entre otros; para las municipalidades; actividad que realiza hace 04 años. Orlando, desarrolla su labor en las gestiones de trabajo que realizan las municipalidades del Valle Río Apurimac; puesto que los ingenieros de cada municipalidad acuden a Orlando; ya que es una persona responsable con las entregas de pedidos de forma puntual. Después de todo también hay dificultades para  obtener las herramientas de trabajo que le solicitan; es por ello que Orlando acude a MFP, para solicitar un préstamo que pueda facilitar sus planes de trabajo y así entregar puntual las herramientas que piden las municipalidades; de la misma forma no quedar mal con sus principales clientes. Este será su crédito numero 02 con MFP, se compromete a pagar puntual las cuotas de pago para que en otra oportunidad pueda acceder a otro crédito. En su banco comunal es un socio participativo y colaborador. Con los 2,000 nuevos soles, podrá comprar las herramientas de trabajo que necesita.
texts.en:
Orlando, 37, is a happy and courageous young man. He lives in a rented room and hopes to continue making an effort in order to be able to have a good place to stay. He is a productive man who provides construction supplies to towns, such as iron, cement and wheelbarrows among other items, a business he has had for four years.

Orlando does his job to further the work efforts engaged in by the towns of Valle Rio Apurimac, since the engineers in each of the towns come to Orlando because he is a person who responds promptly to their requests. There are also difficulties in obtaining the work tools they request. Consequently Orland has come to MFP to apply for a loan that will facilitate his work plans so that he can take punctual delivery of the materials that the cities are requesting. He also does not want to run afoul of his major clients. 

This will be Orlando’s second loan from MFP and he is committed to making his payments on time so that he can apply for another loan at a future time. He is a collaborative member who participates in his communal bank. With the S/. 2000 he will be able to purchase tha work tools he needs.

loans.use: to purchase construction tools.

loans.name: Amal

texts.en:
Amal is a 23-year-old married lady; she has one child. Her husband works as a cashier at a bakery store.

Since her child is still young, Amal wants to make sure that he will get the best life they can offer him, so she started working at home in an embroidery business and small clothing retail business. She has applied for this loan to buy more clothes and head scarves to increase her profit.

loans.use: to buy more clothes and head scarves for resale

loans.name: Hanan

texts.en:
Hanan is a 41-year-old hard-working mother. She lives with her four children and her husband in a rented house.

Hanan’s husband works in a governmental entity and so does she. Hanan has recently started a small business to bring in more income to the family, which is animal sales basically, sheep and goats.  Both Hanan and her husband work in this business after their full-time jobs end.

Now Hanan has applied for this loan to buy animal feed and improve the barn where those animals live.

loans.use: to buy animal feed and improve the barn where their animals live.

loans.name: Trinidad

texts.es:
Trinidad de 41 años es una mujer soltera. Tiene 2 hijos de 16 y 7 años, con quienes vive en una casa propia en el centro poblado San Juan Centro Autiki, en el distrito de Pichanaki – Chanchamayo.
Trinidad es una mujer meticulosa en las labores del hogar. Es así que se animó a preparar alimentos para expenderlos en un restaurante que adecuó en su vivienda. Lleva más de 5 años en este negocio. Empezó vendiendo golosinas y gaseosas, pero gracias al trabajo coordinado con MFP y su esfuerzo, ahora cuenta con sillas y mesas que le permiten atender a sus comensales con comodidad.
“Vendo desayunos, almuerzos y cenas de lunes a domingo”, comenta. Trinidad trabaja toda la semana porque sabe que así, podrá conseguir sus metas. Además, los fines de semana sus labores son más arduas ya que prepara platos especiales como: Tacacho con cecina (plato típico de la selva elaborado con plátanos y carne seca), caldos de gallina, pescados de río en distintas presentaciones (fritos, a la parrilla, en chicharrones, etc.) 
Sus clientes ya la conocen y son fieles a su sazón, es más, son ellos quienes deciden que debe preparar para el día, está contenta con su actividad, porque la vistan seguidamente y puede charlar con ellos, que ya se convirtieron en amigos. Éste sería su crédito número 8 que obtendría de MFP. Como lo hizo antes, esta vez también afirma que pagará las cuotas mensuales con puntualidad. “Flor de San Juan” es el nombre de su banco comunal y muestra apego y confianza con los miembros de su grupo. Invertirá el dinero del préstamo en la compra de insumos e ingredientes para preparar los alimentos. Además podrá pintar las paredes de su local para mejorar la imagen de su negocio.
texts.en:
41-year-old Trinidad is a single woman with two children aged 16 and 7.  They live in their own home in San Juan Centro Autiki, in Pichanaki district, Chanchamayo.  

Trinidad is a meticulous woman when it comes to carrying out her household chores.  She decided to start work preparing meals and selling them in a restaurant that she set up in her home.  She has been in this business for more than five years.  She started out selling sweet treats and soda but, thanks to the coordinated work of MFP and her own efforts, she now has tables and chairs which allow her to serve her customers comfortably.

"I sell breakfasts, lunches and dinners from Monday to Sunday", she says.  Trinidad works all week long because she knows that this way she will be able to achieve her goals.  On weekends her work is more difficult as she prepares special dishes such as 'tacacho con cecina' (a traditional rainforest dish made from plantains and cured meat), chicken soups, freshwater fish prepared in different ways (fried, grilled, battered and fried, etc.)  Her customers already know her and are loyal to the flavor of her food.  What's more, they are the ones who decide what she should prepare each day.  She is happy with her business because her customers visit her, she is able to chat to them and they become friends.

This will be Trinidad's eighth loan from MFP.  She says that she will make her monthly repayments on time as she has in the past.  "Flor de San Juan" is the name of her community bank.  She is very committed to her group and trusts the other members.  Trinidad will invest her loan money in buying supplies and ingredients for preparing her food.  She will also be able to paint the walls of her premises to improve her business' image.

loans.use: to buy products she needs to prepare her food and to buy paint to improve her premises

loans.name: La Esperanza Group

texts.es:
La Esperanza es el grupo formado por 14 mujeres de la ciudad de Santaní, ellas son vecinas y amigas de esa ciudad y tienen como objetivo principal ayudar a sus familias y por medio del trabajo en conjunto poder ayudarles a tener un mejor estilo de vida.
Una de las miembros es la señora María, quien es un persona muy amable y alegre, ella se dedica a la cría y venta de animales, lo que hace desde hace mucho tiempo. Comenta que su trabajo es muy sacrificado, pero que le gusta lo que hace por que es un trabajo digno y decoroso. Su sueño es poder tener una granja donde poder criar mas animales y de esa forma seguir creciendo.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de pollitos y cerdos pequeños para la cría. agradece por la ayuda que esta recibiendo por parte de la fundación y de kiva.
texts.en:
La Esperanza is a group made up of 14 women from the city of Santaní. They are neighbors and friends from this city and, as a principal objective, they want to help their families and help them have a better style of living by working as a whole.

One of the members is María, who is a very nice and happy person. She has made a living raising and selling animals for a long time. She says that her work is very selfless but that she likes what she does because it's decent and respectable work. Her dream is to be able to have a farm where she could raise more animals and in this way keep growing.

She is requesting the loan to buy small chicken and small pigs to raise. She is thankful for the help she is receiving from the foundation and from Kiva.

loans.use: to buy small chicken and small pigs.

loans.name: Vidal Dolores

texts.es: Doña Vidal, de 56 años se dedica ala venta de comida ,tiene 15 años de tener este negocio,  es originaria de Somoto municipio de Estelí .Inicio sus actividades con dinero propio y apoyo de unos sobrinos que viven fuera del país. Así fue creciendo su puesto de comida. Ella  se siente satisfecha en el lugar que vende la comida ya que la demanda que tiene es alta por que esta localizado junto  a una estación de Buses. El préstamo lo solicito para la compra de una cocina y para compra de todos los ingredientes para realizar la comida. Este crédito le ayudara porque podrá invertir en lo necesario para su  negocio y darles una buena atención  a los clientes. Uno de sus planes futuros es comprar un local para poner su negocio y dejar de pagar alquiler.
texts.en: Vidal, age 56, works selling food. She has operated this business for 15 years. She was born in Somoto in the municipality of Estelí. She started her business with her own money and the help of some nephews who live outside the country. Her food stall has gradually grown over time. She is satisfied with the place where she sells the food, since the demand is high thanks to its location by the city's bus station. She applied for the loan to buy a cookstove and also to buy all of the ingredients she needs to prepare her food. This loan will help her because she will be able to invest in necessary items for her business and give good service to her customers.
