One of her future plans is to buy a shop where she can set up her business and stop paying rent.

loans.use: to buy a cookstove and all of the necessary ingredients to prepare her food.

loans.name: Dios Es Amor Group

texts.es:
El Grupo Solidario Dios es Amor está integrado por tres mujeres siendo la líder del grupo la señora Rosa Melida quien se dedica a la venta de ropa nueva de manera  ambulante. Ella junto con sus otras dos compañeras solicitó 8,000.00 lempiras para capital de trabajo ya que desean trabajar en esta época de verano, época en la cual las ventas se ponen buenas.

Sus deseos como integrante de este grupo es que  ella y sus otras dos compañeras salgan bien en sus compromisos e inviertan en sus negocios de la mejor manera con el fin de aumentar sus ganancias y poder mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
The Communal Bank God is Love is made up of three women; the leader is Mrs. Rosa Melida who works selling clothing as a roving salesperson. Mrs. Rosa Melida along with her two partners need a loan of 8,000.00 lempiras for work capital since they wish to work during the summer season, a time when sales are good.

Mrs. Rosa Melida's wishes as a member of this group is that her two partners’ as well as her business do well and that they will invest in the best way to get better earnings and be able to improve their qualities of life.

loans.use: to buy clothing for adults and children, and shoes to sell as a roving salesperson.

loans.name: Fausta Karolina

texts.es:
La señora  Fausta Karolina de 32 años de edad es madre de tres hijos y vive en la comunidad de san Lorenzo, valle. Desde hace unos 10 años dedicándose a varias actividades una de ellas es la venta de achinería y artículos de temporada.

Está solicitando 10,000.00 Lempiras para la compra de útiles escolares para aprovechar la época escolar. Es cliente por segunda vez, con una muy buena historia crediticia, su sueño es tener su propia casa ya que ella alquila actualmente.
texts.en:
Fausta Karolina, 32, is a mother of three and lives in the community of San Lorenzo, Valle. For 10 years she has had several business, one of which is selling trinkets and seasonal items.

She is asking for 10,000 lempiras to buy school supplies to take advantage of the school season. This is her second time as a client, and she has a very good credit history.

Her dream is to own a home, because right now she rents.

loans.use: to buy school supplies to sell this school season.

loans.name: William

texts.es: William, de 19 años, es un joven alegre y trabajador; se esmera por salir adelante para poder tener un buen futuro; vive solo en su propia casa, ubicado en la comunidad de Roca. Los padres del joven William, le enseñaron todo sobre lo que es trabajar en la chacra, es por ello que desde hace 10 años empezó a ganar su propio dinero laborando en los campos de cultivo de sus vecinos quienes le agradecen la ayuda de William; ahora se dedica a los cuidados de sus propias plantas de café, quien con mucho esmero logró obtener. Con el tiempo desea tener varias hectáreas con plantaciones de café y de esa forma lograr tener una buena estadía. Por tal motivo acude a las financieras de MFP, para requerir un préstamo que ayude sus planes de trabajo y en un futuro logre cumplir sus sueños. Este será su crédito número 01 con MFP, esta dispuesto a ser puntual con los pagos para que en otra oportunidad logre acceder a otro crédito. En su banco comunal es muy querido por sus compañeros por ser un joven muy responsable. Con los 1,000 nuevos soles, comprará abono y fertilizantes agroquímicos para hacer el mantenimiento de sus plantas.
texts.en:
William, at 19 years old, is an upbeat and hardworking young man who strives to get ahead in order to have a good future. He lives alone in his own house, which is located in the Roca community. William's parents taught him all about work on a farm, and as a result, ten years ago he began earning his own money working in the fields of his neighbors, who were very grateful for his help. 

William now works tending his own coffee plants, which he obtained through great effort. In time, he hopes to own several hectares of planted coffee, and in this way, be able to earn a good living. With this goal in mind, he approached MFP financiers to request a loan that would help him in his work plans, and in the future, help him make his dreams come true.  This will be his first loan with MFP. He is ready to be punctual with his payments so that on another occasion we will have access to another loan. 

In his communal bank, William is well loved by his peers, as he is a very responsible young man. With the 1,000 nuevos soles, he will purchase manure and agrochemical fertilizers to maintain his crops.

loans.use: to purchase agrochemical fertilizers.

loans.name: Ruth Magaly

texts.es:
La socia   Ruth sigue perteneciendo al banco comunal “IMASUMAC II” y continua viviendo en la ciudad del Cusco y donde también realiza sus actividades económicas. 

La socia Ruth se sigue dedicando a la venta cosméticos y también se dedica  a la venta de ropa. Ella anteriormente se dedicaba a la venta de cerveza pero temporalmente lo dejo. Con el anterior crédito Ruth pudo obtener buenos beneficios como por ejemplo incrementar el capital del negocio y con las ganancias puede dar mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos. En esta oportunidad Ruth requiere el préstamo para compra más ropa y cosméticos. 

La socia Ruth agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
The associate Ruth belongs to the communal bank “IMASUMAC II” and continues living in the city of Cusco where she also conducts her economic activities.

Ruth is still devoted to selling cosmetics and is also dedicated to selling clothes. She previously worked selling beer but has temporarily stopped that.  With her previous loan Ruth was able to obtain good benefits like, for example, increasing the capital of the business.  With her earnings, she could give a better life to her children. With this opportunity Ruth needs the loan to buy more clothes and cosmetics.

The associate Ruth gives thanks for the support to be granted and at the same time she is committed to comply in a disciplined manner with the loan repayments.

loans.use: To purchase clothing and cosmetics.

loans.name: Betuel

texts.es:
El señor  Betuel , se dedica a su negocio de Pulpería, donde vende variedad de productos de consumo diario como ser arroz, frijoles, azúcar, café, pan, huevos, leche, entre otros,  esta actividad la realiza desde hace mas de 10 años,  cuenta con el apoyo de su esposa quien también le ayuda en el negocio, mismo que se encuentra ubicado en un Caserío de la ciudad de Choluteca.  Los ingresos que recibe de su negocio son utilizados para mantener a sus tres hijos quienes actualmente se encuentran estudiando en una escuela pública. Son una familia muy unida y trabajadora asisten juntos a la Iglesia los Domingos.

Esta solicitando un crédito por la cantidad de L. 15,000.00, para poder  surtir su negocio con más variedad de productos para ofrecerle a sus clientes  y así obtener mas ingresos. Espera que Prisma pueda apoyarlo para seguir creciendo.
texts.en:
Betuel has a small grocery store where he sells a variety of daily products like rice, beans, sugar, coffee, bread, eggs, milk and other things. He has been in this business for more than 10 years. His wife also helps him with the business, which is located in a suburb of the city of Choluteca. The income from their business is used to take care of their three children who are currently studying in public school. They are a very close and hardworking family and attend church every Sunday.

He is asking for a loan of 15,000 lempiras to be able to stock his story with a wider variety of products for his customers, and thereby earn more money. He hopes that Prisma can support him to continue growing.

loans.use: to buy  rice, beans, sugar, coffee, bread, eggs, milk and other things for his business.

loans.name: Senovia Felicita

texts.es:
La señora Senovia,  se dedica a su negocio  Venta de variedad de productos “ Pulpería” , donde vende  azúcar, frijoles, café, pan, huevos, arroz, jugos, leche y muchos mas, su negocio tiene mas de 15 años atendiendo a sus vecinos que son sus clientes fijos todos los días a partir de las 6:00 de la mañana, se encuentra ubicado en un Caserío de la ciudad de Choluteca. Esta casada y su esposo  se dedica al cultivo de frijoles, tiene cinco hijos, todos estudiando en la escuela pública del caserío donde viven.

Esta solicitando un crédito por la cantidad de L. 15,000.00, para poder  surtir su negocio con más variedad de productos  y así obtener mas ingresos. Espera que Prisma pueda apoyarla.
texts.en:
Senovia sells a variety of products at her small grocery store, including sugar, beans, coffee, bread, eggs, rice, juices, milk and much more. She has had her business for 15 years, attending to her neighbors who are her consistent customers. She works every day starting at 6:00 am. She is located in a suburb of the city of Choluteca. She is married and her husband grows beans. They have five children, all of whom study in the public school in their town.

She is asking for a loan of 15,000 lempiras to be able to stock her store with a greater variety of products, and thus earn more income. She hopes that Prisma can help her.

loans.use: to buy products to sell in her grocery store, including  including sugar, beans, coffee, bread, eggs, rice, juices, milk and much more.

loans.name: Dejan

texts.en: Originally from Croatia, Dejan is now a resident of Miami, Florida where he founded and operates a transportation company that leases vehicles for use by larger transportation and logistics companies. Currently his company owns three vehicles which he leases for nationwide service. His company provides a service to smaller businesses that need to make shipments across the United States, but do not have the capital to purchase their own transportation.  Dejan has been in this business for quite a few years and has diligently gained an understanding of what it takes to be successful. Seven months ago, Dejan took on a second job at Critical Expedite, a transportation and logistics company, where he continues to expand his knowledge in the field. He is applying for this loan so that his business can continue to perform small projects that will build long lasting partnerships in the future.

loans.use: To finance a marketing strategy.

loans.name: Enrique Haroldo

texts.es:
El señor Enrique Haroldo es casado, tiene 22 años de edad, esta graduado profesionalmente, tiene 2 hijos los cuales están estudiando, se dedica al comercio, a la venta de ropa, inicio como trabajador para otro negocio y hasta el momento lleva 3 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposa quien se dedica al mismo trabajo.

Solicita un prestamos que lo utilizara para la compra de mercadería, consistente en ropa para niños y algunos para grandes, espera en el futuro, tener un negocio amplio.
texts.en:
Sr. Enrique Haroldo is 22 years old, married, and a professional graduate. He has two children who are in school. Enrique is a merchant who sells clothing. He started out as a worker at another business and now he has three years of experience. Enrique has the support of his wife, who is in the same line of work.

He is requesting a loan to buy merchandise, which consists of children's clothing and a few garments for older children. He hopes to have an expanded business in the future.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Martha

texts.es:
Martha de 51 años hace más de 30 años convive con Moisés, el padre de sus 5 hijos. Ahora solo vive con 3 de ellos de 23, 18 y 10 años de edad. Su casa es propia y acogedora, y se ubica en el centro poblado San Juan Centro Autiki, distrito de Pichanaki, provincia de Chanchamayo. Martha lleva 30 años dedicándose a la agricultura. Junto a Moisés trabajó para obtener las 4 parcelas de terrenos que ahora posee. En ellas producen café, plátanos y granadillas. El café y el plátano le han brindado buenas satisfacciones al momento de negociarlos. Esta vez sembró granadillas, cuyas plantas están floreciendo, indicio de que los frutos estarán listos para la cosecha en los meses de mayo a junio.
“Las granadillas se venden bien, por eso me animé a sembrar, ojala que las venda rápido. Cada java (canasta) está a 30 soles”, dice.
El trabajo en el campo es cansado y absorbente, por eso ya sabe como disponer su tiempo para abarcar las labores del hogar sin descuidar su producción.
Sus hijos mayores la apoyan en el cultivo y en la cosecha. Se siente contenta con el apoyo de su familia.
De obtener buenos resultados de sus cultivos de granadillas, ampliará otra parcela con nuevas plantas. Tiene la certeza que le irá bien. Martha recibiría su crédito número 8 de MFP, por eso se compromete a pagar responsablemente las cuotas. También muestra su agrado de pertenecer al banco comunal “Flor de San Juan”, porque sus compañeros son participativos y organizados. Esta vez destinará su préstamo en la compra de 15 mil plantitas de café, con las que iniciará una siembra en 3 parcelas. Cada plantita le costará a 30 céntimos. Con lo restante comprará bolsas de abonos naturales.
texts.en:
Martha is 51 years old.  She has been living with the father of her 5 children, Moisés, for more than 30  years.  Now only three of their children live with them; they are 23, 18 and 10 years old.  They own their cozy home.  It is located in the village of San Juan Centro Autiki, Pichanaki District, Chanchamayo Province.  Martha has been making her living in agriculture for 30 years.  Together with Moisés they worked to obtain the 4 plots of land they currently posses.  On those plots, they grow coffee, bananas and passion fruit.  They have been very satisfied with the coffee and the bananas at the time of sale. Now they have planted passion fruit.  The plants are flowering, indicating that the fruit will be ready to harvest in the months of May and June.
“The passion fruits sell well, which is why I decided to plant them.  Hopefully they will sell quickly.  Each "java" (basket) costs 30 soles”, Martha says.
The work in the fields is tiring and demanding.  And so Martha has learned to arrange her time to complete her housework without neglecting her crops.  
Martha's older children help her with the plants and the harvest.  She feels happy about her family's support.
After assuring good results from her passion fruit plants, Martha will expand another plot with new plants.  She feels certain that it will go well.  Martha will be receiving her 8th loan from MFP, and so she promises to follow her re-payment plan responsibly.  She also takes pleasure in belonging to the communal bank “Flor de San Juan” (Flower of San Juan) because her companions are participatory and organized.  This time, Martha will use her loan to purchase 15,000 little coffee plants, which she will plant in 3 of the plots.  Each small plant will cost 30 cents.  With the rest of the money, she will purchase sacks of natural fertilizer.

loans.use: to purchase 15,000 coffee plants.

loans.name: Virginia

texts.es: Virginia, de 34 años, una mujer empeñosa y dedicada a su hogar, vive en su propia casa junto a su pareja Félix de 38 años y sus 03 queridos hijos a quienes brinda amor y buen futuro. Virginia, desde muy joven empezó a ocuparse en el cultivo de café en los campos verdes de la localidad, una comunidad donde todos los pobladores se brindan apoyo en las cosechas. Hace 26 años que se ocupa a labrar la tierra para luego sembrar plantas de café  en su propio campo de cultivo; con la ayuda de su pareja y de algunos vecinos de su comunidad logran efectuar su labor. Lo que mas le gusta de su trabajo es obtener buenos frutos después de arduo sacrificio. De hecho, Virginia  comenta que no dejará  de producir café ya que es rentable para el sustento de su hogar, por lo tanto no descuidará  sus plantaciones realizando el mantenimiento correspondiente. Este será su crédito número 05 con MFP; se siente contenta por el apoyo que le brindan. En su banco comunal es una mujer solidaria y responsable. Con los 1,000 nuevos soles, podrá contratar jornaleros para que le ayuden con el desmonte de sus plantas de café.
texts.en:
Virginia, 34 years old, is an earnest woman who is dedicated to her home. She lives in her own house with her partner, Felix who is 38 years old, and her three children, whom she dearly loves and for whom she desires to provide a good future. Virginia, from a young age, began working in coffee farming in the green fields of the surrounding area, a community where everyone lends a helping hand during the harvest season. 

Twenty-six years ago, she began working her own land to prepare it for planting coffee. With the help of her partner and several neighbors, they were able to successfully carry out their work. The aspect of Virginia’s work that she enjoys most is obtaining a good harvest after hard sacrifices. In fact, Virginia says that she will not stop producing coffee, since it is profitable for supporting her home. Therefore, she will not neglect her plantings, and will perform the necessary maintenance work. 

This will be her fifth loan with MFP; she is happy with the support they give her. In her communal bank, she is a caring and responsible woman. With the 1,000 nuevos soles she will be able to contract laborers to help her clear her coffee plants.

loans.use: to contract laborers.

loans.name: Murodchon

texts.ru: Муродчон активный и трудолюбивый юноша. За последние 6 месяцев он занимается купле- продажей детских игрушек и сим- карт. Этим бизнесом он помогает своим родителям в содержании семьи. Муродчон хочет расширить свой бизнес и с этой целью запрашивает займ в размере 10000 Сомони для покупки детских игрушек. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Murodchon is an active and hardworking young man.  Over the past 6 months, he has been buying and selling children's toys and SIM cards.  With this business he helps his parents provide for the family.  He would like to expand his activity, and to this end he is requesting a loan in the amount of 10,000 somoni for the purchase of children's toys.  He looks forward to your help and kindness.

loans.use: to buy toys.

loans.name: Virgen Asunta Group

texts.en:
The village bank “Virgen Asunta” is comprised of fourteen entrepreneurs who live in Izcuchaca, located in the Andean highlands of Anta province. The bank was formed in 2008 and is now receiving its eighth loan from Asociación Arariwa. The majority of its members make their living farming and raising livestock, then selling their produce in local markets.

The president of the village bank is Margot, who is raising her hand in the photo. Margot is 45 years old and married with three children between the ages of 20 and 24. For the last eight years Margot has operated a small store from her house, selling groceries such as sugar, rice, milk and pasta. In addition, she has bought and sold cattle for the last twenty years. 

Margot has been a client of Arariwa for several years. She has requested a portion of this group loan of 9950 PEN in order to buy more stock for her store and to purchase a cow. A cow costs about 2,000 soles (about USD $750) at the local livestock market. After raising the cow, she can make a profit by arranging to sell the cow in Lima.

Margot aspires to continue growing her enterprises so that she can qualify for an individual loan in the future.

loans.use: to buy a cow and more stock for her store.

loans.name: Sokha

texts.en:
Sokha, 43, is married and lives with her husband and five children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. 

She has been growing rice for over five years, earning approximately two US dollars per day. Her husband is a soldier who earns approximately three US dollars per day. Two of her children are employed: one is a security guard and another one is a garment worker. 

In order to improve her family’s livelihood, Sokha is requesting a loan of 1,000 US dollars to purchase rice seeds, fertilizer and fuel to use in her farming work. 

In the future, she would like to build a new house and help her children get bachelor degrees.

loans.use: to purchase rice seeds, fertilizer and fuel to use in her farming work.

loans.name: Vilma Victoria

texts.en:
For about 20 years, Vilma has run a food kiosk at a school where she serves lunch and refreshments such as soft drinks. Some of her most popular dishes are stir fry, stew, fried rice, and fried porkchops. She also makes a dish called revuelta de olluquito, which features rice, scrambled eggs and a potato-like tuber.

Vilma is requesting a loan in order to purchase cooking ingredients such as rice, oil, potatoes, vegetables, as well as candy that she can sell at her kiosk. Vilma says that she works for the future of her children, and hopes to finance the remainder of her youngest child’s university education. At 49 years old, she is married with four children between the ages of 22 and 29. She is still supporting her youngest child, but the rest are now living independently.

Vilma is one of 14 members of the village bank “Los Alamos de la Estacion” located in the Andean highlands of Urcos, Cusco.

loans.use: buy cooking ingredients

loans.name: Mehri

texts.ru: Мехри разведена. У нее старший сын. Ему  22 года. Она очень трудолюбивая и добросовестная женщина. Более 10 лет она занимается выращиванием помидоров и огурцов. Одновременно занимается купле- продажей крупного рогатого скота. В обороте имеет 2 голов крупного рогатого скота. Мехри запрашивает займ в размере 5000 Сомони для покупки семян и минеральных удобрений.
texts.en: Mehri is divorced.  She has a grown-up son who is 22 years old.  She is a very hardworking and conscientious woman.  She has been growing tomatoes and cucumbers for more than 10 years.  At the same time, she is also buying and selling cattle.  She currently owns two head of cattle.  Mehri is requesting a loan of 5,000 somoni for the purchase of seeds and mineral fertilizers.

loans.use: to buy seeds and mineral fertilizers.

loans.name: Rafoat

texts.ru: Рафоат замужем и любящая мать двоих детей. Она очень трудолюбивая и добросовестная женщина. Более 11 лет она занимается купле- продажей скота. Начинала бизнес с откармливания мелкого рогатого скота. Данный момент в обороте имеет 4 голов крупного рогатого скота. Муж помогает по бизнесу. Рафоат запрашивает займ в размере 7500 Сомони для покупки скота и корма для них. Она надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Raofat is married and a loving mother of two children. She is very hard working and conscientious woman. Roafoat has been raising and reselling cattle for eleven years. She started her business with raising small livestock, but now has four cows in her herd. Raofat's husband helps her with the animals. She is requesting a loan of 7500 somoni to purchase more livestock and fed for them. Raofat hopes for your help and kindness.

loans.use: To buy cattle and feed for them

loans.name: Kayum

texts.ru: Каюм трудолюбивый и целеустремленный человек. Он женат и на воспитании имеет одного ребенка. Жена занимается пошивом женских платьев. Более 18 лет Каюм занимается откормом и продажей скота. В настоящее время в обороте имеет 2-х  голов крупного рогатого скота. Каюм хотел бы получить займ в размере 3000 Сомони для покупки пиломатериалов для кровли  крыши дома.
texts.en: Kayum is a hardworking and goal oriented man. He is married and is raising one child. His wife makes native Tajik gowns for women. Kayum himself has been raising livestock for more then 18 years. He currently owns two cows. Kayum would like to take out a loan of 3000 somoni to purchase lumber for re-roofing his house.

loans.use: To purchase lumber for roofing houses

loans.name: Suyapa

texts.es:
Suyapa tiene 40 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene tres hijos de 4, 13 y 20 años de edad, uno de ellos está estudiando, vive en San Juan Pueblo, Atlántida, junto a su madre abuelos, hermanas e hijos.

Suyapa, hace cinco años aprovecho una oportunidad de vender comidas rápidas en una cafetería de un colegio de la comunidad, donde vende pollo frito con tajadas, tajadas con carne molida, baleadas y almuerzos cuando le solicitan, adicionalmente vende golosinas como churros, dulce y otros. Sus clientes son los estudiantes del colegio, los que atiende desde la mañana hasta parte de la tarde.
Está solicitando el segundo préstamo para invertirlo en los insumos como carnes, harina, condimentos, verduras, manteca y otros para elaborar comida en la cafetería.
Su meta es volver a establecer el negocio de la pulpería en su casa, la que le generaría otros ingresos para suplir algunas necesidades importantes de su familia.
texts.en:
Suyapa, age 40, is the single mother of three children, ages 4, 13, and 20.  One of them goes to school.  She lives in the San Juan Pueblo, Atlántida with her mother, grandparents, sisters, and children.

Five years ago Suyapa took advantage of an opportunity to sell fast food in the cafeteria of a school in her community.  She sells fried chicken with fried plantains, fried plantains with ground meat, "baleadas" (flour tortillas with beans, eggs, butter, cheese and meat), and lunches when requested.  Additionally, she sells sweets like churros, candy, and others.  Her customers are the students at the school who attend in the morning and part of the afternoon.

She is requesting her second loan to buy ingredients like meat, flour, condiments, vegetables, shortening, and others to make food in the cafeteria.

Her goal is to reestablish her grocery store business in her house.  This would generate other income in order to supply some important necessities for her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like meat, flour, condiments, vegetables, shortening, and others to make food to sell.

loans.name: Dina

texts.es:
Dina de 48 años convive con Eduardo desde que tenía 17 años. Ahora tiene 8 hijos pero sólo vive con 5 de ellos cuyas edades oscilan entre los 20 y 10 años de edad. Esta familia habita un hogar propio en el centro poblado Juan centro Autiki, distrito de Pichanaki – Chanchamayo. Ella es agricultora. Siembra en sus 3 parcelas de terrenos café, plátanos y yuca. La producción de café es rentable para su economía por ello de be cultivar sus plantaciones todo el año. Las cosechas le se ven reflejadas en el dinero obtenido, que le alcanza para abastecer sus gastos diarios, para volver a invertir en otra siembra y para ahorrar algo de dinero. Los plátanos son la clave de su sustento diario, porque las cosechas son semanales; y las yucas le sirven primordialmente para el consumo diario de su familia.
Con la ayuda de Eduardo y de sus hijos mayores puede optimizar su trabajo y hacerlo más agradable.
Dina y Eduardo también trabajan como jornaleros en otros cultivos, obteniendo ingresos diarios. Así también, cuando llega la temporada de cosecha contrata personal para concluirla con rapidez. De esa manera la comunidad se apoya entre todos. Ella está feliz de realizar esa actividad. Así conserva la estabilidad de su hogar. Dina recibiría su crédito número 8 de MFP, mediante su ayuda. Por su parte, se compromete a ser puntual en el pago de las cuentas mensuales. Además muestra agrado e identificación con su banco comunal “Flor de San Juan”. Sus compañeros son responsables y bien organizados. Con el dinero podrá pagar a los jornaleros que contratará para la limpieza de sus cultivos, ya que, la maleza invade con frecuencia sus cafetales, impidiendo su normal crecimiento.
texts.en:
Dina, 48, has been living with Eduardo since she was 17 years old. Now she has 8 children but only lives with 5, whose ages span 10 to 20 years old. This family lives in its own home in San Juan Autiki city center in Pichanaki District, Chanchamayo. 

Dina is a farmer and plants her three parcels of land in coffee, plantains and bananas. Coffee production is economically profitable and she needs to cultivate her plantations all year.  Her crops are reflected in the money earned, which is enough to cover her daily expenses, reinvest in other plantings, and to set some aside in savings. The plantains are the key to her daily livelihood because she harvests them every week and the cassava are used primarily for her family’s daily consumption. With the help of Eduardo and her grown sons she can optimize the work and make it more pleasant.

Dina and Eduardo also work as day laborers on the fields of others, thus earning a daily income. Also, when harvesting season comes she hires personnel to finish quickly. In this way the community engages in mutual support. She is happy to do this work, which enables her to maintain her household’s stability.

Dina will receive her eighth loan from MFP, through your help. She is committed to making her payments punctually. As well, she is grateful to and identifies with her communal bank, “Flor de San Juan.” Her fellow members are responsible and well organized. She will use the money to pay for laborers to clean her fields, since weeds frequently invade her coffee plantations, thereby obstructing normal growth.

loans.use: to hire workers.

loans.name: Firangiz

texts.ru:
Etoy molodoy devochke 25 let. Ona ne zamujem i ne imeyet detey. Firangiz jivet v Fuzuli regione vmeste so svoyey mamoy i otcom. Ona yavlyayetsya IDP personom ona vmeste so svoyey semyoy bila pereselena iz Fuzuli goroda v 1992 qodu v Fizuli region. Ona i yeyo semya ochen trudolubiviye. Ona zanimayetsya skotovodstvom i razvodat korov. Firangiz delayet sir, yogurt i prodayet ix v Magazini Fizuli regiona.  Ona uje 3 qoda kak zanimayetsya skotovodstvom. Ranshe ona razvodila i korov i ovec no seychas izza molochnix produktov ona razvodit tolko korov.
Seychas ona nujdayetsya v 2000 AZN chtobi ludshe razvit i uvelichit svoy bizness. Ona xochet kupit korov i tem samim uvelichit kolichestvo molochnogo produkta. Firangiz etomu biznessu nauchilas u svoyey mami kotoraya pomogayet yey v rabote. 
Внутренне перемещённое лицо (ВПЛ) - человек, который был вынужден внезапно бежать из своего дома в результате вооружённого конфликта, насилия, нарушений прав человека, стихийных бедствий или других катастроф, но, в отличие от беженца, не перешел международную границу и находящийся на территории собственной страны (источник: Управления ООН по Координации Гуманитарных Вопросов)
texts.en:
Firangiz is a 25 year old young woman. She is single and has no children. Firangiz lives in the Fuzuli region together with her mother and father. She is an internally displaced person (IDP), as she and her family have been moved from Fuzuli city to Fuzuli region in 1992. Firangiz and her family are very hard working and raise cattle for a living. Firangiz makes cheese and yoghurt from her cows' milk and sells it to grocery stores in the Fuzuli region. This has been her occupation for three years now. Previously she also raised sheep but due to her dairy business Firangiz decided to focus only on dairy cows. 

Firangiz needs to take out a loan of 2000 AZN in order to expand her business. She wants to purchase another dairy cow and so increase the amount of milk she can process into dairy products. Firangiz learned dairy making from her mother who helps her with this business.

Internally displaced person (IDP) - a person who was forced to suddenly leave their home due to an armed conflict, violence, human rights abuses, natural disasters or other catastrophes, but, unlike a refugee, did not cross international borders and still remains on the territory of his/her country (source: UN Committee on Coordinating Humanitarian Issues).

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Gulmahmad

texts.ru: Гулмахмад трудолюбивый и добрый человек. Он женат и ответственный отец троих детей. Жена занимается домохозяйством. Более 6 лет он занимается купле- продажей муки и масла. Гулмахмад хочет расширить свой бизнес, чтобы улучшить свое жилищные условия. С этой целью запрашивает займ для покупки продуктов для пополнения оборотного капитала. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Gulmahmad is a hard working and kind man. He is married and a responsible father of three children. Gulmahmad's wife is a home maker and he himself has been selling oils and fats on the market for six years. Gulmahmad wants to expand his business to improve the living conditions of his family. For this reason he has requested a loan to purchase more oils and increase his cash resources. He hopes for your help and kindness.

loans.use: To buy groceries

loans.name: Yelsin

texts.es: Yelsin, es un joven  originario de Estelí, tiene 21 años de edad, de oficio comerciante, es dueño de una pulpería antes se dedicaba a vender carne pero con lo ahorros que tenia logro comenzar su negocio de ventas de productos comestibles  que dirige junto con su esposa, el vende cerca de una fabrica tabacalera donde la mayoría de sus clientes son los obreros  que trabajan. El combina sus estudios universitarios  con el negocio de pulpería. El realizo el crédito para compra de pollo, frijoles,  productos de limpieza, vegetales, enlatados, pastas, aceite, azúcar. Productos que le son muy solicitados por sus clientes y necesita surtir para vender. Uno de sus propósitos es  ampliar su negocio convertirlo en una distribuidora de productos comestible y terminar sus estudios en la universidad.
texts.en:
Yelsin is a 21 year old merchant originally from Estelí. He owns a grocery store. Before this he sold meat, but with his savings he was able to start his own business selling groceries, which he manages together with his wife. The majority of his customers are workers at the nearby tobacco factory. 

Yelsin combines his university studies with the grocery store business. He requested the loan to purchase chicken, beans, cleaning products, vegetables, canned goods, pasta, oil, and sugar. These products are in high demand by his customers and he needs an assortment to sell. 

One of his goals is to expand his business, convert it into a grocery distributor, and finish his university studies.

loans.use: to purchase chicken, beans, cleaning products, vegetables, canned goods, pasta, oil, and sugar.

loans.name: Ysabel

texts.es:
Ysabel, de 53 años es una mujer trabajadora, vive en compañía de sus hijos, tuvo 4, pero ahora solo cuida de 2 de ellos: Jeancarlos y Abel en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Cajas. Sola cuidó de sus hijos, pues nunca tuvo la presencia del que fue su pareja. Su principal actividad, que le ayudó a generar muchos ingresos es la venta de comida en su casa. En su restaurante cocina comida criolla de casa y también comida típica del lugar por las tardes, “siempre tengo que dinamiza los platos, porque los cliente se cansan”, comenta muy contenta. Le va muy bien en su negocio, pero como es una mujer con iniciativa, también se dedica a la crianza de cerdos, los cuales engorda para luego matarlos y vender como “lechón” (plato de comida típico del país), ya muchos la conocen y siempre la hacen pedidos.  Pues su secreto es la alimentación de los animales, pues como tiene un restaurante le sale a cuenta preparar su comida cada día. Ahora desea incursionar en el negocio de compra y venta de animales, ya comenzó con la adquisición de un toro que engordará y venderá a buen precio. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Mi banco” y este es el décimo quinto crédito con MFP, donde agradece al apoyo de todos ustedes, ya que obtendrá el préstamo que necesita para lograr sus objetivos. Además promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas, pues los integrantes de su asociación son responsables y solidarios.
Ysabel de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de productos de primera necesidad para preparar los ricos platos de comida.
texts.en:
53-year-old Ysabel is a hard-working woman who lives together with her children.  She had four children but now only cares for two of them (Jeancarlos and Abel) in her own home, in the town of Cajas.  Ysabel brought up her children on her own as her partner was never around.  Her main business activity, which has helped her make a lot of income, is selling meals from her home.  In her restaurant she cooks homemade creole meals and she also serves traditional, regional meals in the afternoons. "I always have to pep up my dishes because my customers become tired of them" she comments happily.  Ysabel's business is doing very well but, as she is a woman with initiative, she also works raising pigs.  She fattens her pigs, then kills them and sells them as 'suckling pig' (a traditional dish in her country).  Many people know Ysabel and they are always placing orders with her.  Her secret is the feed she gives to her animals.  As she has a restaurant it pays to prepare her food every day.  Ysabel would now like to start a business buying and selling animals.  She has already bought a bull which she will fatten and sell for a good price.

Ysabel is a member of 'Mi Banco' community bank and this is her 15th loan from MFP.  She is grateful for everybody's help as she will obtain the loan she needs to achieve her goals.  She pledges to make her repayments on time as the members of her bank are responsible and supportive people.  With your support, Ysabel will invest the money she has requested in buying basic food products for preparing her delicious meals.

loans.use: to buy products such as rice, noodles, milk, sugar and mixed veg for preparing her meals

loans.name: Elshad

texts.ru:
Elshad ochen drujelubniy i dobriy chelovek. On jivet v Fizuli regione vmeste so svoim bratom. Elshad 24 qoda. On pereselen iz Fuzuli goroda i yavlyayetysa IDP personom. Elshad ne jenat. 2 qoda nazad on otkril svoy magazin dlya togo chtobi uje samomu zarabativat i pomogat svoyey semye. Elshad seychas imeyet produktoviy magazin. V svayom magazine on prodayet pisheviye produkti takje on prodayet vinogradniye listya( na fotografii oni naxodatsya s prava v plastikovix butilkax) kotoriye delayet yego mama ,iz etix listyev delayut Azerbaydjanskoye nacionalnoe bludo (Dolma)kotoroye bivayet ochen vkusnim. Seychas on nujdayetsya v 2000 AZN chtobi kupit noviye produkti dlya prodaji v magazi i razvitiya svoyego biznessa. 
Внутренне перемещённое лицо (ВПЛ) - человек, который был вынужден внезапно бежать из своего дома в результате вооружённого конфликта, насилия, нарушений прав человека, стихийных бедствий или других катастроф, но, в отличие от беженца, не перешел международную границу и находящийся на территории собственной страны (источник: Управления ООН по Координации Гуманитарных Вопросов)
texts.en:
Elshad is a friendly and kind fellow. He lives in the Fuzuli region together with his brother. Elshad is 24 years old. He has been moved from Fuzuli city and is an internally displaced person. Elshad is not married. Two years ago he opened a grocery store in order to support himself and to be able to help his relatives. Elshad's store sells groceries and grape leaves prepared by his mother (on the photo they are to the right in plastic bottles). Grape leaves are required for a very tasty Azerbaijani dish, dolma. Currently Elshad needs a loan of 2000 AZN to purchase additional groceries for sale in his store and so to expand his inventory and develop his business. 

Internally displaced person (IDP) - a person who was forced to suddenly leave their home due to an armed conflict, violence, human rights abuses, natural disasters or other catastrophes, but, unlike a refugee, did not cross international borders and still remains on the territory of his/her country (source: UN Committee on Coordinating Humanitarian Issues).

loans.use: to purchase groceries for his store

loans.name: Fazlidin

texts.ru: Фазлидин трудолюбивый и добрый человек. Он женат и на воспитании имеет четверых детей. Более 5 лет он занимается предоставлением услуг такси . Он начал свой бизнес  автомашиной, которую  арендовал у знакомых. Затем зарабатывая деньги в течении двух лет купил себе автомашину. Данный момент он хочет приобрести вторую автомашину с целью расширения бизнеса. С этой целью он запрашивает займ в размере 2800$ США. Он надеется на вашу помощь и милосердие.
texts.en: Fazlidin is a hard working and kind man. He is married and is raising four children. Fazlidin has worked as a taxi driver for five years. He started his business by renting his taxi cab from an acquaintance. After saving money for two years Fazlidin bought his own taxi cab. Currently he wants to purchase a second vehicle in order to expand his business. For this reason he has turned to Kiva for a loan of 2800 US dollars. Fazlidin hopes for your help and charity.

loans.use: To buy a car

loans.name: Milena

texts.es: Milena, de 30 años es una mujer trabajadora. Vive en compañía de sus padres y 7 hermanos a los que cuida en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Cajas. Es una mujer soltera, no se siente mal por ello, pues ayuda a sus hermanos y se supera en su vida, “eso es lo más importante”, afirma. Estudió educación en una Universidad reconocida, ahí obtuvo toda la experiencia necesaria para poder desenvolverse en su carrera. Ahora trabaja en un proyecto de educación del gobierno, donde ella es supervisora de la zona, ahí se encarga de velar el cumplimiento de la alfabetización de los ancianos y adultos que no lograron culminar sus estudios, le gusta mucho esta noble misión y está dichosa de ayudar a las personas a superarse. Pero como los demás pobladores de su zona, también se dedica a la fabricación de ladrillos junto a su hermano, juntos realizan un promedio de 29 millares, no puede dedicarse a tiempo completo, por ello produce muy poco. Pero ahora está pensando contratar peones para que puedan fabricar más ladrillos. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Mi banco” y este es el décimo séptimo crédito con MFP, donde agradece al apoyo de todos ustedes, ya que obtendrá el préstamo que necesita para lograr sus objetivos. Además promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas, pues los integrantes de su asociación son responsables y solidarios. Milena de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de arcilla, chapla (especie de leña para quemar los ladrillos) para la fabricación de ladrillos.
texts.en: Milena, age 30, is a hardworking woman. She lives with her parents and 7 siblings, whom she looks after, in her own home, located in the town of Cajas. She is single, but she does not feel bad about it since she helps her siblings and is getting ahead in life, and "that's the most important thing," she states. She studied Education in a well-known university, where she obtained the experience necessary to develop in her career. She is now working on a government education project in which she is the area supervisor. She oversees a literacy program for both the elderly and for adults who were not able to finish their studies. She likes this noble mission very much and is happy to help people get ahead.  Nevertheless, just like the rest of the locals, she also makes bricks for a living alongside her brother. They both make an average of 29 thousand, but she cannot work on brick making full-time, which is why she produces so few. However, she is now thinking about hiring workers who can produce even more bricks. She is a member of the Mi Banco Communal Bank, and this is her 17th loan with MFP. She is grateful for the support she gets from all of you since she will obtain the loan that she needs to achieve her goals. Furthermore, she promises to be punctual in making her repayments since the members of her association are responsible and united. Milena will invest the loan she is requesting in purchasing clay and chapla (a type of firewood used to burn the bricks) for brick production.

loans.use: to purchase clay and firewood to make bricks.

loans.name: Trival Group

texts.es:
Ellas son el grupo Trival, esta formado por cinco entusiastas integrantes. Todas ellas son vecinas y conocidas que viven en la región de Guadalupe. Juntas tomaron la decisión y el compromiso de adquirir un crédito grupal para hacer crecer su negocio.
Sanjuana, es una integrante del grupo, se dedica a la venta de calzado de segunda. Es madre de dos hijos y se esfuerza día a día en su negocio para ofrecerles un mejor futuro a sus hijos mediante la educación, pues ella solo estudio hasta la primaria. 
Con este crédito pretende invertir en ropa y calzado de primera para mejorar con ellos sus ingresos y llegar de esta manera a nuevos clientes. Tiene la esperanza de que así sea.
texts.en:
The Trival group is made up of five enthusiastic members. All of the women are neighbors and acquaintances that live in the region of Guadalupe. Together they made the decision and commitment to obtain a group loan in order to make their business grow. 

Sanjuana is a group member who sells second-hand footwear. She is the mother of two children and she works hard everyday in her business to be able to offer them a better future through education, as she only studied through primary school. 

With this loan she plans to invest in new clothing and footwear. She hopes that these will help her to increase her earnings and thus attract new customers.

loans.use: to invest in clothing and footwear for her business.

loans.name: Davron

texts.ru: Даврон трудолюбивый и добросовестный человек. Он женат и на воспитании имеет троих детей. Более 16 лет Даврон занимается купле продажей скота. В бизнесе помогает жена. Кроме скотоводства он занимается выращиванием риса. Даврон хочет расширить свой бизнес, чтобы улучшить свои жилищные условия. Даврон запрашивает займ в размере 3000 Сомони для покупки скота и корма для них. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Davron is a hard working and conscientious man. He is married and has three children. For more then 16 years Davron has been raising and reselling livestock. His wife helps him with the animals. Aside from livestock Davron also grows rice. Currently Davron wants to expand his business so that he can improve his living situation. He is requesting a loan of 3000 somoni to purchase cattle and feed for them. Darvon hopes for your help and kindness.

loans.use: To buy cattle and feed for them

loans.name: Firidun

texts.ru:
Firidun 44 qoda. On jenat i imeyet 3 prekrasnix detey. Firidun jivet v Fuzuli regione vmeste so svoyey lubimoy jenoy i detmi. On yavlyayetsya IDP personom i pereselenec iz Fuzuli goroda. On seychas nujdayetsya v 2000 AZN chtobi kupit korovi dlya uludsheniya svoyego biznessa i uvelicheniya kolichestva korov. Tak kak  on imeyet 3 detey kotoriye uje podrastayut i postupayut v universiteti, Firidun seychas nujdayetsya v uvelichenii mesachnix doxodov dlya svoyey semyi. On uje 11 let kak zanimayetsya skotovodstvom i razvodit korov. Firidun etomu biznesu nauchilsya u svoyego dedushki. 
Внутренне перемещённое лицо (ВПЛ) - человек, который был вынужден внезапно бежать из своего дома в результате вооружённого конфликта, насилия, нарушений прав человека, стихийных бедствий или других катастроф, но, в отличие от беженца, не перешел международную границу и находящийся на территории собственной страны (источник: Управления ООН по Координации Гуманитарных Вопросов)
texts.en:
Firidun is 44 years old. He is married and has three wonderful children. Firidun lives in the Fuzuli region together with his loving wife and kids. He is an internally displaced person who has been moved from the Fuzuli city. Currently Firidun requires a loan of 2000 AZN so that he can purchase a cow. This purchase will allow him to improve his business and increase the number of cows in his herd. Firidun's three children are growing up and are starting to apply for college so Firidun needs to increase his monthly profits to support his family. He has been raising cattle for eleven years. He has learned to take care of animals from his grandfather.

Internally displaced person (IDP) - a person who was forced to suddenly leave their home due to an armed conflict, violence, human rights abuses, natural disasters or other catastrophes, but, unlike a refugee, did not cross international borders and still remains on the territory of his/her country (source: UN Committee on Coordinating Humanitarian Issues).

loans.use: to purchase a cow

loans.name: Vilma Lastenia

texts.es:
Vilma Lastenia, tiene 38 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene 4 hijos de 21, 20, 14 y 8 años de edad, solo uno de ellos estudia, vive en aldea Cedros, Tela, Atlántida.

Doña Vilma desde los 16 años aproximadamente, comenzó a vender mercadería, actualmente vende ropa para damas, caballeros y niños, calzado, cosméticos, lociones, cremas, por catalogo de productos AVON. Ha mantenido su negocio por el buen trato brindado a los clientes. Le dedica 6 horas diarias 3 veces a la semana, realizando las ventas a domicilio.

Ha solicitado cuatro préstamos a ODEF con el actual para mantener surtido su negocio e incrementar las ventas, de donde ha podido obtener ingresos para cubrir los gastos del hogar. con este préstamo va comprar productos Avon, ropa y calzado para surtir y seguir generando ingresos para la manutención de su familia.
texts.en:
Vilma Lastenia, age 38, is the single mother of four children, ages 21, 20, 14, and 8.  Only one of them goes to school.  She lives in the village of Cedros, Tela, Atlántida.

Approximately 16 years ago Vilma started to sell merchandise.  She currently sells clothes for women, men, and children.  She also sells footwear, cosmetics, lotions, and creams from a catalog of Avon products.  She has maintained her business because she treats her customers well.  She devotes six hours a day, three times a week to making door-to-door sales.  

She has requested four loans from ODEF.  She will use the current loan to keep her business stocked and increase sales.  This is where she has been able to get income to cover the household expenses.  She will use this loan to buy Avon products, clothes, and footwear and continue generating income to support her family.

loans.use: to buy Avon products, clothes, and shoes to stock her business.

loans.name: Elida

texts.es: Elida, de 32 años es una mujer trabajadora. Vive en compañía de Boris, su esposo. Ambos tienen una hija, Abigail a la que cuidan en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Cajas. Su hijo pequeño comenzó a estudiar en el colegio por ello, ahora trabaja con más esfuerzo. Su principal actividad económica es la venta de productos de primera necesidad en su tienda de comestibles, que es conocida entre sus vecinos, quienes todas las mañanas visitan su casa para comprar los alimentos del día. Paralelo a ese trabajo su esposo se dedica a la consultoría, pues estudió la carrera de ingeniería zootécnica, gracias a ello, tiene varios ganados, entre ovinos y vacunos que comercializa en el mercado central a los carniceros que visita constantemente. De esta manera obtienen los ingresos necesarios para poder mantener su familia. Pero sus planes son aumentar el capital de su tienda y hacer conocida la consultora de su esposo. De esa manera poder mejorar y crecer. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Mi banco” y este es el duodécimo crédito con MFP, donde agradece al apoyo de todos ustedes, ya que obtendrá el préstamo que necesita para lograr sus objetivos. Además promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas, pues los integrantes de su asociación son responsables y solidarios. Elida de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de productos de primera necesidad para su tienda de comestibles.
texts.en: Elida, who is 32 years old, is a hard-working woman.  She lives with her husband, Boris.  They have a daughter, Abigail, who they raise in the home they own.  The live in a neighborhood called Cajas.  Her son started high school, which is why Elida now works even harder.  Her main business is selling basic needs products in her small grocery.  Her store is known amongst her neighbors, who come by every morning to purchase their food for the day.  Alongside this work, her husband has a consultancy.  He studied to be a Zoo Technical Engineer.  Thanks to that, they have various heads of livestock including sheep and cattle, which they sell to the butchers who frequent the central market.  In this way, they earn the income they need to support their family.  But their plans are to increase the store's capital and to make her husband's consultancy more well-known; to grow and to improve.  Elida belongs to the communal bank “Mi Banco” (My Bank), and this is her twelfth loan with MFP.  She is grateful for all of your support, as she will be able to get the loan she needs to meet her goals.  In addition, she promises to be punctual in repaying her loan.  The members of her communal bank are responsible and supportive.  Once she receives her loan, Elida will invest the requested money in the purchase of basic needs products for her grocery.

loans.use: to purchase basic products to stock her store.

loans.name: Elvis

texts.es: Elvis de 26 años es un trabajador. Vive en compañía de Cintia, su esposa desde hace 3 años. Ambos tienen un hijo: Gabriel al que cuidan en una casa alquilada, ubicada en la localidad de Cajas. Desde niño comenzó a trabajar para ayudar a sus hermanos en las diferentes gastos económicos del hogar. Desde entonces aprendió a trabajar en el cuidado de animales, y con el tiempo tecnifico esta actividad. Cuenta con varias cabezas de ovejas, toros y vacas. Las cuales engorda para luego vender su carne a los carniceros de una feria muy conocida, el vende al por mayor la carne. Ya muchos lo conocen y le pagan muy bien por su trabajo, “Alimento a mis animales con comida sana, por ello la carne es rica”, afirma. Paralelo a ese trabajo confecciona sombreros típicos, que al igual que la carne lo vende al por mayor a los comerciantes del mercado más concurrido de la zona. Ahora él desea mejorar su negocio, por ello desea incrementar su capital de trabajo y así obtener mejores ganancias. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Mi banco” y este es el cuarto crédito con MFP, donde agradece al apoyo de todos ustedes, ya que obtendrá el préstamo que necesita para lograr sus objetivos. Además promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas, pues los integrantes de su asociación son responsables y solidarios. Elvis de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de más reses para su negocio.
texts.en:
26-year-old Elvis is a hard-working man.  He lives together with Cintia, his wife of three years.  The couple have one son, Gabriel, who they are bringing up in a rental house, in the town of Cajas.

Elvis learned to work when he was a child in order to help his siblings with their various household expenses.  He learned to raise animals and, over time, he started incorporating modern technology into his business.  He has several head of sheep, bulls and cows.  He fattens the animals and then sells their meat to butchers in a very well-known market.  He sells the meat wholesale.  Many people already know him and pay him very well.  "I give my animals healthy feed and, as a result, their meat is very rich", he says.  In parallel with this business, Elvis makes traditional hats which he also sells wholesale to traders in the busiest market in his area.  Right now, he would like to improve his business.  He would like to increase his working capital and make better profits.

Elvis belongs to the 'Mi Banco' community bank and this is his fourth loan from MFP.  He is grateful for everybody's support as he will obtain the loan that he needs to achieve his goals.  He pledges to make his repayments on time because the members of his bank are responsible and supportive people.  With your support, Elvis will invest the money he has requested in buying more cows for his business.

loans.use: to buy more cows

loans.name: Jahangir

texts.en:
Jahangir is 34 years old and married with four children. He is an Internally Displaced Person and lives with his family in Bilasuvar IDP Settlement. He breeds cattle and sells milk and milk products, as well as cattle for meat to local butchers. 

Jahangir has more than five years' experience in this field, thanks to his father who taught him the best way to look after cattle. He receives 90 Azerbaijani manat (AZN) per month in financial support from the government, but this is too low to cover his family's needs.

Jahangir usually buys small cattle, raises and fattens them in five to six months and then resells them for a more profitable price in the local livestock bazaar. He sells milk and yoghurt to his neighbours. Milk and yoghurt, as well as meat, are very popular products in Azerbaijan. People use meat in everyday national dishes such as pilau and dolma and they always use yoghurt sauce. Milk products are considered to be very healthy and are also common in everyday life.   

Selling milk and meat brings in 300 AZN per month. This is Jahangir's only income in his family and is not enough to cover the basic needs of his beloved children. 

Jahangir has applied for a 1200 AZN loan to purchase two baby cattle, one milk cow and fodder. 

This will be his fourth loan from AqroInvest and Jahangir has a good client history.

loans.use: to purchase two baby cattle, one milk cow and fodder.

loans.name: Mubariz

texts.ru:
Mubariz jivet v Fizuli regione vmeste so svoyey drujelubnoy semyoy. On jenat i imeyet 3 detey. Mubariz yavlyayetsya IDP personom on pereselenec iz Fuzuli goroda. Mubariz 41 qod. On uje 7 let kak imeyet svoy magazin gde prodayet sportivnuyu odejdu , shapki , sharfi, noski i t.d. Mubariz ochen trudolubiviy chelovek on starayetsya vseqda delat novshestva v svayom biznesse. Mubariz etomu biznessu nauchilsya u svoyego druga kotoriy pomog yemu otkrit etot magazin. Seychas on nujdayetsya v 2000 AZN chtobi kupit noviye tovari dlya vesennego sezona dlya uludsheniya svoyego biznessa. 
Внутренне перемещённое лицо (ВПЛ) - человек, который был вынужден внезапно бежать из своего дома в результате вооружённого конфликта, насилия, нарушений прав человека, стихийных бедствий или других катастроф, но, в отличие от беженца, не перешел международную границу и находящийся на территории собственной страны (источник: Управления ООН по Координации Гуманитарных Вопросов)
texts.en:
Mubariz lives in the Fuzuli region together with his close-knit family. He is married and has three children. Mubariz is an internally displaced person from Fuzuli city. He is 41 years old. For more then seven years Mubariz has been managing a store where he sells exercise clothes, hats, scarves, socks etc. Mubariz is a very hard working man who always tries to improve his store. He has learned how to manage a store from his friend who also helped him open his own place. Currently Mubariz needs a loan of 2000 AZN in order to purchase spring inventory and have more to offer for his clients. 

Internally displaced person (IDP) - a person who was forced to suddenly leave their home due to an armed conflict, violence, human rights abuses, natural disasters or other catastrophes, but, unlike a refugee, did not cross international borders and still remains on the territory of his/her country (source: UN Committee on Coordinating Humanitarian Issues).

loans.use: to purchase goods for sale

loans.name: Izahat

texts.ru:
Izahat 52 qoda. On jenat i imeyet 4 detey. Yego deti dobriye i drujelubniye. Izahat ochen privazan k svoyey semye. On jivet v Fuzuli regione vmeste so svoyye lubimnoy jenoy i detmi. Izahat pereselenec iz Fuzuli goroda on yavlyayetsya IDP personom. On seychas nujdayetsya v 2000 AZN chtobi kupit korovi dlya uludsheniya i razvitiya svoyego biznessa. Izahat uje 10 let kak zanimayetsya skotovodstvom i razvodit korov. On ochen lubit jivotnix i uxajivat za nimi. Etomu biznessu on nauchilsya u svoyego otca kotoriy toje zanimalsya skotovodstvom. 
Внутренне перемещённое лицо (ВПЛ) - человек, который был вынужден внезапно бежать из своего дома в результате вооружённого конфликта, насилия, нарушений прав человека, стихийных бедствий или других катастроф, но, в отличие от беженца, не перешел международную границу и находящийся на территории собственной страны (источник: Управления ООН по Координации Гуманитарных Вопросов)
texts.en: Izahat is 52 years old, married and has four children. Izahat loves his family and his children are kind and friendly. They live in the Fuzuli region together. Izahat is an internally displaced person who fled Fuzuli city. Currently he needs a loan of 2000 AZN so that he may buy a cow and expand his livestock business. Izahat has been raising livestock for ten years and loves his animals and taking care of them. He has learned animal husbandry from his father who also raised cattle.

loans.use: to purchase a cow

loans.name: Eva Esperanza

texts.es:
Eva Esperanza de 41 años de edad, es madre soltera con 2 hijos de 13 y 16 años de edad quienes estudian la secundaria, vive con sus hijos en Santa Cruz de Yojoa.

Eva, necesitaba obtener ingresos para ayudar a sus hijos en los estudios, pues decidió invertir sus ahorros y establecer una pulpería, desde hace nueve años, ella vende productos de la canasta básica, actualmente tiene más surtido, vende huevos, arroz, azúcar, manteca, condimentos, pastillas, productos de limpieza, chinola carne de pollo etc. ella le dedica tiempo completo a su negocio.
Para mantener surtido ha decidido solicitar este préstamo de 11,000.00 Lempiras del cual comprara arroz, manteca, azúcar, salsina, carne de pollo y otros que necesita. Todo este esfuerzo lo hace con el propósito de ayudar a sus hijos con los estudios y tener un nivel económico mejor.
texts.en:
Eva Esperanza is 41 years old and a single mother with two children (ages 13 and 16) who are high school students. She lives with her children in Santa Cruz de Yojoa.

Eva needed to generate income to help with her children's studies, so she decided to invest her savings and open a grocery store. She has been in business for nine years. Eva sells basic household products and currently has more inventory. She sells eggs, rice, sugar, lard, condiments, medicines, cleaning products, Chinese chicken, and other products. Eva spends all of her time at her business.

In order to maintain her inventory, she decided to request this loan in the amount of 11,000 HNL so that she can buy rice, lard, tomato sauces, cleaning products, chicken, and other items that are needed. All of her efforts are intended to help her children with their studies and have a better standard of living.

loans.use: to buy rice, lard, tomato sauces, cleaning products, chicken, and other items.

loans.name: Luzmila

texts.es: Luzmila de 42 años, es una mujer soltera. Vive en compañía de su mamá Florencia y su hermana Dionicia, en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Cajas Chico. Aún no tiene familia, eso no le importa mucho. Pues le satisface cuidar a sus hermanos. El trabajo al que se dedica es la fabricación de ladrillos junto a su familia. Realiza un promedio de 25 millares al mes, todo lo realiza gracias al personal que contrata, ya que así pueden mejorar sus ganancias y aumentar su capital. Ya tiene 20 años de experiencia, en este tiempo pudo obtener muchos clientes que esperan la llegada de Luzmila a la feria que se realiza una vez a la semana en la localidad, para comprar los ladrillos de calidad que realiza. Sus principales materiales, que utiliza para realizar los ladrillos son corteza, para quemar los moldes, aserrín y arena. Ahora desea mejorar la calidad de su producción para poder incrementar sus ganancias. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Mi banco” y este es el crédito número veintidós con MFP, donde agradece al apoyo de todos ustedes, ya que obtendrá el préstamo que necesita para lograr sus objetivos. Además promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas, pues los integrantes de su asociación son responsables y solidarios. Luzmila de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de insumos para la fabricación de los ladrillos.
texts.en: Luzmila, age 42, is a single woman. She lives with her mother, Florencia, and her sister, Dionicia, in her own home, located in the town of Cajas Chico. She does not yet have her own family, which does not matter much to her because she is satisfied with taking care of her siblings. She makes bricks for a living alongside her family. She produces an average of 25 thousand bricks a month thanks to the workers that she hires because they can boost profits and increase capital this way. She has 20 years of experience, during which time she has been able to gain many customers who await her arrival at the local open air market so that they can purchase her quality bricks. The main supplies that she uses to produce the bricks are bark to burn the molds, sawdust, and sand. She now hopes to improve the quality of her bricks so that she can boost profits. She is a member of the Mi Banco Communal Bank, and this is her 22nd loan with MFP. She is grateful for the support she gets from all of you since she will obtain the loan that she needs to achieve her goals. Furthermore, she promises to be punctual in making her repayments since the members of her association are responsible and united. Luzmila will invest the loan that she is requesting in purchasing the supplies she needs to produce bricks.

loans.use: to purchase sand, clay, and other supplies needed for brick making.

loans.name: Demetrio

texts.es:
Demetrio de 30 años convive con Doris de 24 años, que fruto de este gran amor tienen 3 hijos, ellos viven en su casa propia ubicado en el distrito de Llochegua. Demetrio es un hombre muy trabajador dedicado al cultivo de  cacao desde hace 18 años atrás, el trabaja juntamente con su querida esposa y algunos peones quienes le facilitan en la extracción de sus productos. Demetrio siempre se preocupa del manejo de su terreno agrícola ya que si no estaría pendiente de sus cultivos su producción seria mínimo, es por ello que Demetrio se sacrifica desde las 7:00 de la mañana hasta las 6:00 de la tarde. A parte de tener sus cultivos de cacao también tiene una parcela de frutales que le genera pequeños ingresos como para los gastos del hogar. Él siempre a tratado de minimizar los gastos para así brindarles a sus hijos una buena educación.
Demetrio está contento con esta labor que tiene, porque le genera un ingreso económico rentable, mas adelante desea seguir expandiendo sus cultivos. Este es su primer crédito con MFP, por lo que él se compromete en cancelar puntualmente el pago de sus cuotas.
Con los 2,500 nuevos soles comprará fertilizantes, también comprará plantas de cacao.
texts.en:
30-year-old Demetrio lives with his partner Doris who is 24.  Their three children are the fruit of their great love.  They live together in their own home, in Llochegua district.  Demetrio is a very hard-working man who has been growing cacao for 18 years.  He works together with his beloved wife and some laborers who help him pick his produce.  Demetrio is always taking care of his farmland because if he doesn't pay attention to his crops, his production will be minimal.  For this reason he works hard from 7.00 in the morning until 6.00 in the evening.  In addition to growing his cacao, he also has a plot of land where he has fruit trees.  This makes him a small amount of income which helps towards covering his household expenses.  Demetrio has always tried to minimize his expenses so that he can provide his children with a good education.

Demetrio is happy with the work that he does because it makes him good income.  In the future, he would like to expand his crops.  This is his first loan from MFP and he pledges to make his repayments on time.  Demetrio will use his 2,500 soles to buy fertilizers and cacao plants.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and cacao plants

loans.name: Khorn

texts.en:
Khorn, age 44, is a barber. He earns approximately USD 3 per day. His wife is a rice farmer who earns about USD 2 per day. Two of their three children are employed in a garment factory. Approximately, they earn USD 6 per day. The family lives in Kampong Chnang Province in Cambodia.

Khorn is requesting a loan in the amount of USD 500 to purchase aluminum alloy tube for constructing his house's ladder. In the future, he would like to run a grocery store from his home in order to generate more income for the family. He also wishes to rebuild his present house to strengthen it so as to provide better living conditions for the family.

loans.use: to purchase aluminum alloy tube for constructing his house's ladder

loans.name: Karla Patricia

texts.es:
Karla, de 28 años  de edad, madre soltera, es comerciante se dedica ala venta de ropa por lo que inicio su negocio con dinero que obtuvo mediante un préstamo ya que en ese momento no contaba con dinero para poner el negocio , ya había tenido experiencia con una pulpería dejo de dedicarse a este negocio debido a que su hijo se enfermo. Pero su hermana la ha apoyado y le ayuda a dirigir el negocio  de la venta  de ropa  la cual  vende desde su casa y ambulante y le ha ayudado a conseguir mejores ingresos para mantener a su hijo y los gastos del hogar.  

Ella realizo el crédito para la compra de uniformes, pantalones, camisas , pues son productos que son demandados durante la temporada escolar además que el crédito le permitirá ofrecer una variedad de ropa y vender mas. Una de sus principales metas es expandir su negocio de pulpería y tener una tienda general de ropa y variedades
texts.en:
Karla, who is 28 years old, is a single mother.  She is a storekeeper who sells clothing, which she began with the money that she got through a loan since at that moment she did not have money to put into the business.  She had already had experience with a corner store.  She stopped working at this business due to the fact that her son became ill.  But her sister has supported her and helps her to manage the clothing sales business which she sells from her home and through traveling.  She has helped her to get a better income in order to take care of her son and the costs of the house.

She used the loan to buy uniforms, pants, and shirts, since they are products that are in high demand during the school year.  The loan will allow her to offer a variety of clothing and sell more as well.  One of her main goals is to expand her corner store business and to have a general clothing and variety store.

loans.use: to buy uniforms, pants, and shirts.

loans.name: Jose Marcelo

texts.es:
Jose Marcelo tiene 30 años es soltero vive con los padres no tiene hijos. Vive en Chillanes Provincia de Bolivar. 

La ventanilla SAN ISIDRO esta conformada por 10 socios, esta ubicada en el Canton Chillanes a 45 minutos de la oficina esta ventanilla se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maiz, mora y frejol. 

Jose Marcelo se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maiz, mora y frejol el credito va utilizar en la compra de urea, fertilizantes para los cultivos, comprar de semillas.
 
Las compras las realiza en Comercial Silva y las vende en la feria de los domingos en Chillanes. El sueño de Jose Marcelo es tener dinero para comprar una casa y un vehiculo para el trabajo.

Le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Jose Marcelo is 30 years old, single, and lives with his parents in Chillanes, Bolivar Province. He has no children.

The San Isidro Communal Bank consists of 10 members and is located in the canton of Chillanes, which is 45 minutes from the offices of Cooperativa San Jose. The members of this Communal Bank engage in agriculture, such as growing corn, blackberries, and beans.

Jose Marcelo is a farmer who grows corn, blackberries, and beans. He will use this loan to buy urea, fertilizers for his crops, as well as seeds. He purchases his supplies at the Silva Market and sells his products at the Sunday fair in Chillanes. His dream is to have money to buy a house and a vehicle for his work.

Jose Marcelo enjoys playing sports.

loans.use: to buy urea, fertilizers, and seeds.

loans.name: Anni

texts.en:
Anni, age 37, lives in Hartavan village with her husband and three children. Anni's husband is a retailer. He also helps Anni to run the family farm, where they cultivate land and breed cattle. As a result of hard work and patience, the couple has developed the farm and have been able to support their children. 

Anni wants to increase the number of cattle. She also needs some means to purchase necessary forage to feed the cattle. This loan will help Anni to earn more income, which is vital for her to cover the rising costs of the family and to ensure a prosperous life for her children.

loans.use: to purchase cattle and pay for cattle forage

loans.name: Dionicia

texts.es: Dionicia, de 57 años es una mujer trabajadora, cuidó de su hijo Diofer, con quien vive en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Cajas. Se siente dichosa, pues su hijo es todo un profesional y ahora trabaja. “Me ayuda es muy bueno”, comenta. Gracias a la fábrica de ladrillos que tiene, pudo sacar adelante a su hijo, ya tiene 30 años dedicándose a esto. Cuenta que le ayuda peones, quienes contrata para trabajar junto a ella, al mes hace una hornada que consta de 25 millares de ladrillos, los cuales traslada en camión a la feria que se realiza todas las semanas en la zona principal de ese producto en la ciudad. Ahí obtiene buenas ganancias, tanto así que ahora espera aumentar la cantidad que ladrillos que ase al mes, para ello quiere contratar más personal. Lo que más le gusta es recoger leña para quemar los moldes de arcilla que realiza, cuenta que es divertido, pues camina en el campo, su lugar preferido. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Mi banco” y este es el cuarto crédito con MFP, donde agradece al apoyo de todos ustedes, ya que obtendrá el préstamo que necesita para lograr sus objetivos. Además promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas, pues los integrantes de su asociación son responsables y solidarios. Dionicia de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de arcilla, arena y demás insumos para la preparación de ladrillos.
texts.en: Dionicia, age 57, is a hardworking woman. She raised her son, Diofer, with whom she lives in her own home, located in the town of Cajas. She is very proud because her son is now a working professional. "He helps me and is a very good person," she states. Thanks to her brick factory, she has been able to help her son get ahead since she has been doing this activity for 30 years. She states that with the help of laborers, whom she hires to help her out, she makes 25 thousand bricks a monthly, which she then transports to the local market by truck every week in the city's brick district. She earns good profits there, so much so that she now hopes to increase her monthly brick production. For this, she would like to hire more workers. What she likes most about her job is gathering firewood to burn the clay bricks that she makes. She states that it is fun because she walks in the countryside, her favorite place. She is a member of the Mi Banco Communal Bank, and this is her fourth loan with MFP. She is grateful for the support she gets from all of you since she will obtain the loan that she needs to achieve her goals. Furthermore, she promises to be punctual in making her repayments since the members of her association are responsible and united. Dionicia will invest the loan that she is requesting in purchasing clay, sand, and other supplies needed to make bricks.

loans.use: to purchase sand and clay to make more bricks.

loans.name: Senderos Al Exito Group

texts.es: Doña Coraide, es miembro del Banco Comunal Senderos al Éxito, tiene 64 años de edad, es casada y tiene 6 hijas, todos sus hijos son independientes y ella y su esposo residen en la aldea de San Nicolás, en el departamento de Olancho. En 1994 inicio su actividad comercial con la cria y destazo de cerdos, actualmente se dedica a la venta de productos lácteos y aprendió este oficio de su madre. Trabaja con una de sus hijas y el negocio lo abre  a las 5:00 A.M  y lo cierra a las 9:00 P.M. Cuenta con la ventaja que tiene buenas ventas, su desventaja es que cuando da al crédito no siempre le pagan puntualmente. Una de sus dificultades es que tiene problemas de salud y eso le ocasiona gastos. Coraide solicita este préstamo para comprar plásticos y lácteos como ser: mantequilla, queso, quesillo, cuajada, etc. Con el apoyo de este préstamo ella podrá tener mayores ingresos porque obtendrá ganancias. Sus sueños son tener un negocio bien surtido y con bastante clientela. Tiene 18 años de ser cliente en FAMA y es una cliente que ha pagado puntualmente sus cuotas.
texts.en:
Coraide is a member of the 'Senderos al Éxito' (Paths to Success) community bank.  She is 64 years old, married, and has six children.  All of her children are independent and she and her husband live in the small village of San Nicolás,in Olancho department.  In 1994 Coraide started out in business raising and slaughtering pigs.  She currently works selling dairy products, a trade she learned from her mother.  She works together with one of her daughters.  She opens her business at 5.00am and closes it at 9.00pm.  One of the advantages of her business is that she makes good sales.  One of the disadvantages is that when she provides her customers with credit they don't always pay on time.  One of the difficulties she faces is health problems and she has incurred expenses as a result of this.

Coraide is requesting this loan to buy plastic products and dairy products such as butter, cheese, 'quesillo' (soft cheese), curds, etc.  With the support of this loan, she will make more income and profits.  Her dream is to have a well-stocked business and a good number of customers.  She has been a client of FAMA for 18 years and she is a client who has always made her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy plastic products and dairy products

loans.name: Sabina

texts.es:
Sabina tiene 29  años de edad, es casada y tiene 1 hijo, cuenta con casa propia la cual esta ubicada en un caserío rural el cual lleva por nombre “San Paulo” perteneciente al distrito de Tambogrande en la provincia de Piura, es un caserío pequeño que esta en vías de desarrollo pues ya cuentan con los servicios básicos de agua y energía eléctrica.

Su actividad económica principal de Sabina es el de dedicarse a la venta de ropa, para lo que ella recorre los caseríos aledaños al suyo ofreciendo sus distintas prendas de vestir, pues ya a la actualidad se generado su buenos clientes que cada vez que necesitan se comunican con ella para realizar sus pedidos. Pues recibe el apoyo de su esposo el cual participa también de todas las actividades que ella realiza para llegar a cumplir sus objetivos.

Sabina desea engrandecer su negocio ya que aun tiene mercado por satisfacer por lo que le hace falta capital de trabajo, por ese motivo esta solicitando un crédito a Edpyme Alternativa por un monto de 1000 Nuevos Soles para poder comprar ropa de mejores marcas y variedades los cuales podría ponerlos a mejores precios y así generarse mayores utilidades para el mejoramiento de sus condiciones de vida.

Cuenta con buenas referencias de parte de sus vecinos de su caserío.
texts.en:
Sabina is 29 years old, married, and has a son.  She has her own house which is located in a rural, country village, which is named "San Paulo".  It belongs to the Tambogrande district in the Piura province.  It is a small country village that is developing.  They already have basic services of water and electric energy.

Sabrina's main economical activity is the sale of clothing, for which she travels to the villages that are nearby her own, offering her different clothing garments.
